title: Genbu I
text:
1. Genbu gains Black Tortoiseshell stacks equal to its <color=#FF423F>Down Points</color>, increasing its Defense and damage reduction.
2. When Genbu is hit by an attack other than its weakness or a critical, it gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Down Point</color> and 1 Black Tortoiseshell stack.
3. At the start of its action, if Genbu has 8 Black Tortoiseshell stacks, it will activate Genbu's Rage and deal heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Shadows gain the following abilities as turns progress.
Starting on turn 3, Shadows gain 1 <color=#FF423F>Berserk</color> stack every turn.
Starting on turn 5, Shadows gain 2 <color=#FF423F>Berserk</color> stack every turn.
Berserk: Damage increases by 10%. Stacks up to 20 times.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. At the start of battle, Genbu will gain <color=#FF423F>Black Tortoiseshell</color> stacks equal to its <color=#FF423F>Down Points</color>, and its Defense and damage reduction will increase with each stack.
2. When Genbu is hit by an attack other than its weakness or a critical, it will gain 1 <color=#FF423F>Down Point</color> and <color=#FF423F>Black Tortoiseshell</color> stack.
When hit by its weakness or a critical, it will lose 1 <color=#FF423F>Black Tortoiseshell</color> stack.
When Genbu is knocked down, it becomes unable to act for 2 turns, and cannot recover Down Points or use skills.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
3. At the start of its action, Genbu may activate <color=#FF423F>Genbu's Rage</color> and deal heavy Ice damage to all Phantom Thieves.
Damage increases based on the number of <color=#FF423F>Black Tortoiseshell</color> stacks.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. At the start of battle, Genbu will gain <color=#FF423F>Black Tortoiseshell</color> stacks equal to its <color=#FF423F>Down Points</color>, and its Defense and damage reduction will increase with each stack.
2. When Genbu is hit by an attack other than its weakness or a critical, it will gain 1 <color=#FF423F>Down Point</color> and <color=#FF423F>Black Tortoiseshell</color> stack.
When hit by its weakness or a critical, it will lose 1 <color=#FF423F>Black Tortoiseshell</color> stack.
When Genbu is knocked down, it becomes unable to act for 2 turns, and cannot recover Down Points or use skills.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
3. At the start of its action, if Genbu has 8 Black Tortoiseshell stacks, it will activate <color=#FF423F>Genbu's Rage</color> and deal heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves.
4. The effect of <color=#FF423F>Black Tortoiseshell</color> applies to other Shadows as well.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. When Suzaku attacks, it inflicts 1 stack of <color=#FF423F>Nuclear Heat</color> to the target.
2. When the number of Nuclear Heat stacks reaches 6, the Phantom Thief takes heavy damage.
3. For each stack of Nuclear Heat, the Phantom Thief's Attack decreases.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
4. When Apsaras attacks, it inflicts <color=#FF423F>Nuclear Heat</color> on the target.
5. When Hua Po attacks, it removes 2 stacks of Nuclear Heat from itself.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. When Suzaku attacks, it inflicts 1 stack of <color=#FF423F>Nuclear Heat</color> to the target.
2. When the number of Nuclear Heat stacks reaches 6, the Phantom Thief takes heavy damage.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
3. At the start of battle, Suzaku will select 1 Andras.
 When the selected Andras attacks, the target is inflicted with 2 stacks of <color=#FF423F>Nuclear Heat</color>.
4. When the selected Andras is defeated, all Phantom Thieves have their Nuclear Heat removed.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. When Suzaku attacks, it inflicts 1 stack of <color=#FF423F>Nuclear Heat</color> to the target.
2. When the number of Nuclear Heat stacks reaches 6, the target takes heavy damage.
3. When Suzaku is attacked, it inflicts 1 stack of Nuclear Heat on the attacker.
4. Succubus will grant a barrier to Suzaku that can negate damage once.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. When Suzaku attacks, it inflicts 1 stack of <color=#FF423F>Nuclear Heat</color> on the target.
2. When a Phantom Thief reaches 6 stacks of Nuclear Heat, they take heavy damage.
3. When Suzaku attacks a Phantom Thief with less than 50% HP, it inflicts 2 stacks of Nuclear Heat on the target.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Archangel will make Phantom Thieves <color=#FF423F>Dizzy</color> for 2 turns.
At the start of the next turn, if any Phantom Thieves are Dizzy, Archangel will use <color=#FF423F>Lunge</color> to deal heavy damage.
2. Archangel will make Phantom Thieves Dizzy based on their turn order.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text: 3. If Archangel's <color=#FF423F>shield</color> is broken, all Phantom Thieves will recover from <color=#FF423F>Dizzy</color>.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Archangel will make Phantom Thieves <color=#FF423F>Dizzy</color> for 2 turns.
At the start of the next turn, if any Phantom Thieves are Dizzy, Archangel will use <color=#FF423F>Lunge</color> to deal heavy damage.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Archangel will make Phantom Thieves <color=#FF423F>Dizzy</color> for 2 turns.
At the start of the next turn, if any Phantom Thieves are Dizzy, Archangel will use <color=#FF423F>Lunge</color> to deal heavy damage.
2. When Archangel is attacked, it will inflict 2 stacks of <color=#FF423F>Sin</color> on the attacker.
The Phantom Thief with the most Sins will become Dizzy.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
3. Archangel deals more damage based on the number of <color=#FF423F>Sin</color> stacks present.
4. Attacking Apsaras will remove 1 Sin.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Archangel will make Phantom Thieves <color=#FF423F>Dizzy</color> for 2 turns.
At the start of the next turn, if any Phantom Thieves are Dizzy, Archangel will use <color=#FF423F>Lunge</color> to deal heavy damage.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
2. The Shadow has two stances, <color=#FF423F>Attack Position</color> and <color=#FF423F>Defense Position</color>.
Attack Position increases Attack by 10% each turn, and resets when the stance is changed.
Defense Position increases Defense by 10% each turn, and resets when the stance is changed.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
3. At the start of battle, Archangel selects 1 Phantom Thief, and changes stances each time it is attacked by that Thief.
The selected Thief cannot become <color=#FF423F>Dizzy</color>.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
4. When in Attack Position, Archangel will use <color=#FF423F>Lunge</color> against all Phantom Thieves.
When in Defense Position, Archangel will cause attackers to become <color=#FF423F>Dizzy</color>.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. At the start of battle, Eligor activates <color=#FF423F>Royal Domain</color>.
Royal Domain changes all the user's affinities to <color=#FF423F>Null</color>.
2. On Eligor's turn, it summons 1 Berith and activates <color=#FF423F>Royal Aid</color>.
Royal Aid is granted to 1 Berith, heals 50% of its max HP, negates 50% of damage taken for 1 turn, and inflicts <color=#FF423F>Taunt</color> on all Phantom Thieves.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
3. If a Berith is defeated, Eligor loses a certain amount of HP.
4. If the number of Beriths increases, Eligor activates <color=#FF423F>Royal Conquest</color>, dealing heavy Physical damage to all Phantom Thieves.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. On Eligor's action, it can summon 1 Berith and activate <color=#FF423F>Royal Favor</color>.
Royal Favor is granted to 1 Berith, decreasing its Defense but greatly increasing its damage.
2. When Eligor dies, all Beriths gain Royal Favor.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text: 3. If the number of Beriths increases, Eligor activates <color=#FF423F>Royal Conquest</color>, dealing heavy Physical damage to all Phantom Thieves.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. On Eligor's action, it can summon 1 Berith and activate <color=#FF423F>Royal Authority</color>.
Royal Authority grants <color=#FF423F>Royal Fealty</color> to 1 Berith.
When Eligor takes damage, this Berith will take damage instead.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
2. When a Berith is defeated, Eligor gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Royal Sorrow</color> stack.
When it has 3 stacks, it enters the <color=#FF423F>Royal Wrath</color> state.
3. When Royal Wrath is active, Eligor can activate Royal Conquest, dealing heavy Physical damage to all Phantom Thieves.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. On Eligor's action, it summons 1 Berith and activates <color=#FF423F>Royal Decree</color>.
Royal Decree: Select 1 Phantom Thief, and Berith focuses attacks on that Thief for the next turn.
2. When Eligor has <color=#FF423F>Royal Majesty</color> and attacks a Phantom Thief with a skill, the damage taken by that Thief is permanently increased.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. At the start of battle, Eligor activates <color=#FF423F>Royal Domain</color>.
While Royal Domain is active, all Shadows have increased Attack and Defense.
2. On Eligor's action, it can activate <color=#FF423F>Royal Healing</color> to restore HP to all Shadows.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
When Nue acts, Nue and other Shadows will gain one of the following random effects for 1 turn:
<color=#FF423F>Monkey Mask</color>: At the end of the turn, heals a certain amount of HP. Heals any elemental ailments.
<color=#FF423F>Tanuki Form</color>: Gains an 80% dodge chance. Heals any spiritual ailments.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
<color=#FF423F>Tiger Claws</color>: Greatly increases damage.
<color=#FF423F>Snake Tail</color>: Inflicts Poison when dealing damage.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. At the start of battle, Nue gains all 4 of the following effects:
<color=#FF423F>Monkey Mask</color>: At the end of the turn, heals a certain amount of HP.
<color=#FF423F>Tanuki Form</color>: Gains an 80% dodge chance.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
<color=#FF423F>Tiger Claws</color>: Greatly increases damage.
<color=#FF423F>Snake Tail</color>: Inflicts Poison when dealing damage.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
2. When the Monkey Mask, Tanuki Form, Tiger Claws, or Snake Tail Shadows are defeated, the corresponding effects will be removed from Nue.
3. When all 4 effects have been removed, Nue will become Weakened.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
When Nue acts, Nue will gain 1 of the following random effects for 3 turns:
<color=#FF423F>Monkey Mask</color>: At the end of the turn, heals a certain amount of HP. Heals any elemental ailments.
<color=#FF423F>Tanuki Form</color>: Gains an 80% dodge chance. Heals any spiritual ailments.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
<color=#FF423F>Tiger Claws</color>: Greatly increases damage.
<color=#FF423F>Snake Tail</color>: Inflicts Poison when dealing damage.
<color=#FF423F>Nue's Power</color>: Greatly increases Attack and Defense.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Every 2 turns, Yaksini will activate <color=#FF423F>True Wage War</color>.
True Wage War has a high chance to <color=#FF423F>Enrage</color> all Phantom Thieves.
Rage: Causes target to use <color=#FF423F>normal attacks</color> uncontrollably.
Attack is greatly increased, and Defense is greatly decreased.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text: 2. When Yaksini is hit by a normal attack, it gains 1 Yaksha, increasing its Attack for each stack.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Every 2 turns, Yaksini will become <color=#FF423F>Enraged</color>, and randomly target 1 Phantom Thief, dealing heavy Physical damage on the next turn.
Rage: Causes target to use <color=#FF423F>normal attacks</color> uncontrollably.
Attack is greatly increased, and Defense is greatly decreased.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text: 2. When Yaksini is hit by a normal attack, it gains 1 Yaksha, increasing its Attack for each stack.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. When Yaksini's HP falls below 50% for the first time, it will activate <color=#FF423F>True Wage War</color>, and enter Counterattack Stance for 1 turn.
True Wage War has a high chance to <color=#FF423F>Enrage</color> all Phantom Thieves.
Rage: Causes target to use <color=#FF423F>normal attacks</color> uncontrollably.
Attack is greatly increased, and Defense is greatly decreased.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
<color=#FF423F>Counterattack Stance</color>: When Yaksini is hit by a normal attack, it will counterattack and deal single-target Physical damage to the attacker.
2. When Yaksini hit by a normal attack, it gains 1 Yaksha, increasing its Attack for each stack.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Starting on turn 2, Yaksini will activate <color=#FF423F>True Wage War</color> multiple times.
True Wage War has a high chance to <color=#FF423F>Enrage</color> all Phantom Thieves.
Rage: Causes target to use <color=#FF423F>normal attacks</color> uncontrollably.
Attack is greatly increased, and Defense is greatly decreased.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
2. The damage Inugami receives from normal attacks is greatly decreased.
When Inugami is defeated, all Phantom Thieves gain <color=#FF423F>Inugami's Blessing</color>, significantly increasing ailment resistance for 2 turns.
3. When Yaksini is hit by a normal attack, it gains 1 Yaksha, increasing its Attack for each stack.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Oni always has <color=#FF423F>Absolute Counter</color>.
Whenever it takes damage, it will counterattack, dealing single-target Physical damage to the attacker.
2. Whenever Oni counterattacks, a count is added, and when the count reaches 4, it activates <color=#FF423F>Hyakki Yagyo</color>, dealing heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
3. On each of Oni's turns, 1 Phantom Thief gains <color=#FF423F>Oni Slayer</color>.
A Phantom Thief in this state will not activate Oni's Absolute Counter for 1 turn.
4. When Obariyon is defeated, all Phantom Thieves gain Oni Slayer for 1 turn.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Every 2 turns, Oni will gain <color=#FF423F>Absolute Counter</color> for 1 turn.
Whenever it takes damage, it will counterattack, dealing single-target Physical damage to the attacker.
2. Whenever Oni counterattacks, a count is added, and when the count reaches 4, it activates <color=#FF423F>Hyakki Yagyo</color>, dealing heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Each turn, Oni will alternate between <color=#FF423F>Physical Counter</color> and <color=#FF423F>Magic Counter</color>.
Whenever it takes damage of the corresponding attribute, it will counterattack, dealing single-target Physical damage to the attacker.
2. Whenever Oni counterattacks, a count is added, and when the count reaches 4, it activates <color=#FF423F>Hyakki Yagyo</color>, dealing heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Shiki-Ouji's initial affinity to each attribute is Normal.
2. Each time it receives damage from an attribute, Shiki-Ouji's affinity to that attribute permanently becomes <color=#FF423F>Null</color>.
Each time Shiki-Ouji's affinity changes, as a <color=#FF423F>Side Effect</color>, its damage taken is also permanently increased by 30%.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text: 3. When Koropokguru is defeated, all of Shiki-Ouji's affinities are reset, and it loses all Side Effects.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Shiki-Ouji starts with all affinities as Normal.
Each turn, Shiki-Ouji randomly changes 5 affinities to <color=#FF423F>Null</color> for 1 turn.
2. At the end of Shiki-Ouji's turn, it gains 3 <color=#FF423F>Woe</color> stacks.
Each stack increases its damage by 50%.
Each time Shiki-Ouji takes damage, it loses 1 stack.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
3. If Shiki-Ouji has Woe at the beginning of its turn, it changes to <color=#FF423F>Disaster</color>.
When it has 3 stacks of Disaster, it automatically activates <color=#FF423F>Karma</color>, dealing heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Shiki-Ouji's initial affinity to each attribute is <color=#FF423F>Null</color>.
2. Each time Mokoi receives damage, Shiki-Ouji's affinity to a random attribute becomes <color=#FF423F>Normal</color>.
Shiki-Ouji can have a maximum of 1 affinity set to Normal.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
3. Each time Shiki-Ouji receives damage from an attribute, its affinity to that attribute permanently becomes Null.
Each time Shiki-Ouji's affinity changes, as a <color=#FF423F>Side Effect</color>, its damage taken is also permanently increased by 30%.

title: Special Effects
text:
When a Shadow is defeated, the damage dealt by all Phantom Thieves increases by 25%.
Stacks up to 2 times.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. Due to the erosion of Mementos, after any Phantom Thief's action, all Phantom Thieves lose 5% HP.
2. After all Phantom Thieves receive healing, their damage increases by 25%. Lasts 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.

title: Special Effect
text:
After a Shadow takes damage, damage dealt by all Phantom Thieves increases by 5%.
Stacks up to 10 times.

title: Special Effect
text: Increases the damage of all Phantom Thieves' <color=#FF423F>Fire</color> attacks by 50%.

title: Special Effect
text: Increases the damage of all Phantom Thieves' <color=#FF423F>Ice</color> attacks by 50%.

title: Special Effect
text: Increases the damage of all Phantom Thieves' <color=#FF423F>Electric</color> attacks by 50%.

title: Special Effect
text: Increases the damage of all Phantom Thieves' <color=#FF423F>Wind</color> attacks by 50%.

title: Special Effect
text: Increases the damage of all Phantom Thieves' <color=#FF423F>Psychokinesis</color> attacks by 50%.

title: Special Effect
text: Increases the damage of all Phantom Thieves' <color=#FF423F>Nuclear</color> attacks by 50%.

title: Special Effect
text: Increases the damage of all Phantom Thieves' <color=#FF423F>Bless</color> attacks by 50%.

title: Special Effect
text: Increases the damage of all Phantom Thieves' <color=#FF423F>Curse</color> attacks by 50%.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. Cerberus will summon servants during the battle.
When a servant is defeated, Cerberus takes Almighty damage.
2. When Cerberus has taken a certain amount of damage, it moves to the next phase, and all Phantom Thieves' SP is restored.

title: Special Effect
text:
Each time a certain number of turns pass, Melchizedek changes its affinities, decreasing its damage taken.
It also summons a servant. When the servant is defeated, the Phantom Thieves' critical rate and critical damage are increased.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. At the start of battle, Zaou-Gongen gains 15 stacks of Vajra Shield. Each stack decreases damage taken by 5%.
2. When Zaou-Gongen takes damage from a skill or Resonance, it loses 1 stack of Vajra Shield.
3. When Zaou-Gongen loses all stacks of Vajra Shield, all Phantom Thieves gain Demon Power, increasing their damage.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. At the start of battle, Oberon and Titania each gain 5 Fairy Power, decreasing damage taken by 4% per stack.
2. Each time Oberon or Titania is defeated, the other will spend 1 Fairy Power to summon them again.
3. When their Fairy Power is depleted, Oberon and Titania will be weakened, greatly increasing their damage taken.
Lasts for 2 turns, after which they regain 5 Fairy Power.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. Power will summon servants. When a servant is defeated, Power takes Almighty damage based on the servant's max HP.
2. Power will restore all Phantom Thieves' SP each turn, but also uses Angel's Bindings on the Phantom Thief with the highest Attack, greatly decreasing their damage.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. At the start of battle, Zaou-Gongen gains 15 stacks of Vajra Shield. Each stack decreases damage taken by 5%.
2. When Zaou-Gongen takes damage from a skill or Resonance, it loses 1 stack of Vajra Shield.
3. When Zaou-Gongen loses all stacks of Vajra Shield, all Phantom Thieves gain Demon Power, increasing their damage.

title: Special Effect
text:
Each turn, the Four Heavenly Kings will focus their Death Stare on 1 Phantom Thief.
They will prioritize attacking the Phantom Thief under the Death Stare.
By using Taunt skills, a Phantom Thief can transfer the Death Stare to themselves.

title: Special Effect
text: Each turn, Asura inflicts Vajra Curse on the 2 Phantom Thieves with the highest Attack, greatly decreasing their damage.

title: Special Effect
text: Each turn, Asura inflicts Vajra Curse on the 2 Phantom Thieves with the highest Attack, greatly decreasing their damage.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. At the start of battle, Seiryu gains 2 Azure Scales stacks, and gains 1 more stack every turn.
Each stack decreases damage taken by 15%.
2. When Seiryu takes weakness damage, it loses 1 Azure Scales stack.
3. When Seiryu loses all Azure Scales stacks, all Phantom Thieves gain Seiryu's Might, increasing their damage.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. Sraosha will summon servants during the battle.
When a servant is defeated, Sraosha takes Almighty damage based on the servant's max HP.
2. Sraosha will restore all Phantom Thieves' SP each turn, but also uses Debilitate on the Phantom Thief with the highest Attack, greatly decreasing their damage.
3. When a servant loses a Down Point, all Phantom Thieves' damage is increased by 15%. Lasts for 1 turn.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. Baphomet will summon minions during the battle.
2. When a minion is knocked down, all Phantom Thieves' damage is increased by 15% for 1 turn.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. At the start of battle, Asura gains 2 stacks of Vajra Armor and restores 1 stack each turn.
Each stack reduces damage taken by 15%.
2. When Asura takes damage from its weakness, it loses 1 stack of Vajra Armor.
3. When Asura loses all stacks of Vajra Armor, all Phantom Thieves gain Demon Subjugation, increasing their damage.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. Cu Chulainn gains 2 Runic Protection stacks each turn. Each stack decreases damage taken by 15%.
2. When Cu Chulainn takes damage from its weakness, it loses 1 Runic Protection stack.
3. When Cu Chulainn loses all Runic Protection stacks, all Phantom Thieves gain Runic Strength, increasing their damage.
4. Cu Chulainn will restore all Phantom Thieves' SP each turn, but also inflicts Runic Curse on the Phantom Thief with the highest Attack, greatly decreasing their damage.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. Each turn, Titania gains 2 Fairy Power.
2. Titania loses 1 Fairy Power each time she takes a Physical attack.
3. Before the start of her turn, Titania spends all Fairy Power to activate Fairy Curse, decreasing all Phantom Thieves' damage by 15% for each Fairy Power spent.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. Baphomet will summon minions during the battle.
When a minion is defeated, Baphomet takes Almighty damage based on the minion's max HP.
2. Baphomet will restore all Phantom Thieves' SP each turn, but also inflicts Devilish Hex on the Phantom Thief with the highest Attack, greatly decreasing their damage.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. At the start of battle, all four angels are affected by Demonic Curse, changing all affinities to Weak. Lasts for 1 turn.
2. Raphael will restore all Phantom Thieves' SP every turn, but also inflicts Angelic Binding on the Phantom Thief with the highest Attack, greatly decreasing their damage.

title: Special Effect
text:
Each turn the Four Heavenly Kings will focus their Death Stare on 1 random Phantom Thief.
They will prioritize attacking the Phantom Thief under the Death Stare.

title: Special Effect
text:
Quetzalcoatl forms a <color=#FF423F>Soul Link</color> with all Yurlungurs.
Soul Link: Distributes all damage received between all Shadows who share this condition, based on the percentage of their current HP.

title: Special Effect
text:
1. Melchizedek gains 6 stacks of Divine Protection each turn, and each stack of Divine Protection decreases damage taken by 5%.
2. Melchizedek loses 1 Divine Protection each time it takes damage from a skill or Resonance.
3. When Melchizedek has lost all Divine Protection, all Phantom Thieves receive Divine Protection, and their damage is increased.

title: Special Effects
text:
1. At the start of battle, Lilith summons 4 servants.
Lilith and all servants are in the <color=#ff3b37>Soul Link</color> state.
Soul Link: Distributes all damage received between all Shadows who share this condition, based on the percentage of their current HP.
2. Each turn, Lilith grants 1 Cover of Night stack to all Shadows.
Cover of Night: Decrease final damage taken by 15% for each stack. Stacks up to 2 times.
3. When a Shadow with Cover of Night is inflicted with an elemental ailment, remove 1 Cover of Night stack.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
At the start of its turn, Suzaku will select 1 Phantom Thief and decrease their Defense. On the next turn, it will attack the selected Phantom Thief.
<color=#FF423F>Guarding</color> is recommended.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. Oni will use the <color=#FF423F>Taunt</color> skill on all Phantom Thieves.
2. If all Shadows besides Oni are defeated, Oni will become Weakened.

title: The Velvet Trials
text: If Lamia survives for more than 3 turns, it will use a powerful multi-target attack skill.

title: The Velvet Trials
text: After being defeated, Shadows take greatly increased damage.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. When Eligor's HP falls below 70% or 30%, it summons 1 minion.
While the minion is present, Eligor's damage increases and its damage taken decreases.
2. The minion will attack the Phantom Thief with the lowest percentage of remaining HP.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. At the end of Zouchouten's turn, it selects a random Phantom Thief to attack on the next turn.
2. While Ippon-Datara is present, Zouchouten's Attack is increased.
3. While High Pixie is present, Zouchouten's Defense is increased.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
4. While Succubus is present, Zouchouten's critical rate is increased.
5. When all Shadows besides Zouchouten are defeated, Zouchouten will activate a special skill after 3 turns.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. Phantom Thieves affected by Nue's <color=#FF423F>Plague Curse</color> will be unable to heal starting from the <color=#FF423F>next turn</color>. Lasts for 2 turns.
2. Onmoraki will only attack Phantom Thieves who are unable to heal.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. Sui-Ki can only take <color=#FF423F>Physical</color> and <color=#FF423F>Gun</color> damage.
After being knocked down, all affinities become Weak.
2. When Mothman is defeated, all Phantom Thieves' critical rate is greatly increased. Lasts for 2 turns.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. When Shiki-Ouji's HP is reduced to 0, it will not be defeated, but enters a <color=#FF423F>False Death</color> state.
After 2 turns, it will recover some HP and increase the Attack of all Shadows.
2. When all Shiki-Ouji are in the False Death state, you win the battle.
3. At the start of Shiki-Ouji's turn, it has a set chance to grant itself a <color=#FF423F>barrier</color> that can nullify damage once.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
Shadows gain the following abilities: After taking damage, all other Shadows take decreased damage. Stacks up to 5 times.
When defeated, the decreased damage effect on all other Shadows is removed.

title: The Velvet Trials
text: Shadows gain the following abilities: At the start of the turn, gain a barrier that can nullify damage once.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. Every 3 turns, Anubis will curse 1 Phantom Thief, dealing 50% of their max HP as damage and knocking them down.
The curse is lifted when the cursed Phantom Thief's HP is fully healed.
2. If the curse is not lifted within 2 turns, the Phantom Thief will be KO'd.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. When Unicorn is affected by a debuff, its Attack and Defense are permanently decreased. This effect can stack.
2. When Unicorn uses Charge and is affected by a debuff while Charging, it immediately counterattacks with a powerful skill and removes the debuff.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. Leanan Sidhe will first remove its own debuffs, and then remove Unicorn's debuffs.
If neither of them have any debuffs, it uses an attack skill.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. At the start of the battle, Okuninushi becomes invincible and does not attack, instead summoning 4 random enemies.
2. Nigi Mitama: After 3 turns, it unleashes a powerful area attack skill.
3. Kushi Mitama: It has low HP but high attack power.
It targets the Phantom Thief with the lowest HP and attacks with an insta-kill skill.

title: The Velvet Trials
text: 4. Saki Mitama: It has high HP and Defense, but its Defense decreases each turn.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
5. When the other Shadows are defeated, Okuninushi will be Weakened, and can be attacked.
Lasts for 2 turns.
6. When Okuninushi's HP falls below 66%, it becomes invincible again and randomly summons 4 more enemies.
7. When the Shadows are defeated, Okuninushi becomes Weakened again.

title: The Velvet Trials
text: 8. When Okuninushi's HP falls below 33%, it will begin to attack.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. At the start of battle, Belphegor randomly selects 1 Phantom Thief, greatly increasing their max HP, but reducing their remaining HP to 5%.
2. The higher the HP percentage of the Phantom Thief, the more damage will be dealt.
3. Belphegor will summon Mokoi, who will flee after 1 turn.
If Mokoi is defeated, all Phantom Thieves restore 30% HP.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. Due to a mysterious power, all Phantom Thieves will be <color=#FF423F>unable to heal</color> during this Trial.
2. Attacking Kodama will greatly increase the Attack of all Phantom Thieves for 2 turns.
3. Attacking Sudama will add <color=#FF423F>Life Drain</color> to all Phantom Thieves' attacks for 2 turns.
4. Defeat Arahabaki to win the battle.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. All of Black Ooze's affinities start as <color=#FF423F>Weak</color>.
2. After taking damage, Black Ooze's affinity to that attack's attribute becomes <color=#FF423F>Repel</color>. Lasts for 2 turns.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. At the end of each turn, Suzaku raises the Heat level.
If the Heat is high at the start of the turn, Suzaku deals heavy Nuclear damage to all Phantom Thieves.
2. If Jack Frost is defeated, <color=#FF423F>the Heat level decreases significantly</color>.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
The Archangels switch between <color=#FF423F>Discipline</color> and <color=#FF423F>Fervor</color> modes for both Phantom Thieves and Shadows.
Discipline: Damage taken is greatly decreased, and healing is greatly increased.
Fervor: Damage both taken and dealt is greatly increased.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. When Arahabaki takes damage, it will record the attribute of the damage taken.
2. When Arahabaki takes damage of the <color=#FF423F>same attribute</color> it previously recorded, its <color=#FF423F>damage taken</color> increases. This effect can stack.
3. When Arahabaki takes damage of a different attribute than the one it recorded, the increased damage taken effect is removed, and Arahabaki's damage increases.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. When Take-Minakata takes damage, it will record the attribute of the damage taken.
2. When Take-Minakata takes damage of a <color=#FF423F>different attribute</color> than what it previously recorded, its <color=#FF423F>damage taken</color> increases.
This effect can stack.
3. When Take-Minakata takes damage of the same attribute as the one it recorded, the increased damage taken effect is removed, and Take-Minakata's damage increases.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
Defeating Shadows will grant the following effects:
1. Jack-o'-Lantern: When defeated, the attacking Phantom Thief's Attack decreases by 30%.
2. Jack Frost: When defeated, the attacking Phantom Thief's Attack increases by 30%.
3. King Frost: When defeated, the attacking Phantom Thief's Attack increases by 100%.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. When Shadows damage a Phantom Thief, their <color=#FF423F>SP</color> will decrease.
2. Every 2 turns, Setanta summons 1 Sudama.
When Sudama is defeated, all Phantom Thieves restore SP.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. The first damage Girimehkala takes is greatly decreased, but <color=#FF423F>the next damage taken is greatly increased</color>. When Girimehkala acts, this effect is reset.
2. Girimehkala summons 1 Sudama every turn.
When Sudama is defeated, Girimehkala takes 5 hits of Almighty damage.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. The first damage Oberon and Titania take is greatly increased, but <color=#FF423F>the next damage taken is greatly decreased</color>.
This effect is reset every 2 turns.
2. When either Oberon or Titania is defeated, the other will become Sad for 1 turn.
After they recover, their damage will be significantly increased.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. Due to a mysterious power, a random Phantom Thief or Shadow will gain 1 stack of <color=#FF423F>Soul Vessel</color> each turn.
Soul Vessel: Damage and healing effect increase, but a set amount of HP is lost every turn.
Stacks up to 5 times.

title: The Velvet Trials
text: 2. When a character with Soul Vessel is defeated, the attacker <color=#FF423F>takes all of their Soul Vessel stacks</color>.

title: The Three Fates
text:
1. Clotho uses Moirai Binding to grant a random Phantom Thief a Thread of Fate.
2. Lachesis uses Moirai Spinning to change a Phantom Thief's Thread of Fate to <color=#FF423F>Weave of Fate</color>.
Weave of Fate: Attack increases based on Thread of Fate.

title: The Three Fates
text:
3. At certain times, Clotho, Lachesis and Atropos will summon a Spirit of Fate.
Defeating the Spirit of Fate will grant an <color=#FF423F>additional buff</color> to Phantom Thieves with a Weave of Fate.

title: The Three Fates
text:
4. At certain times, Atropos will use <color=#FF423F>Moirai Cutting</color>, dealing severe damage to Phantom Thieves with a Weave of Fate.
(1) After Atropos has acted 10 times.
(2) After Clotho or Lachesis have been defeated.
(3) After Atropos has been defeated.

title: Yamata-no-Orochi
text: 1. When Yamata-no-Orochi's HP reaches 0, it revives with new affinities and skills. It can revive up to 4 times.

title: Yamata-no-Orochi
text:
2. After reviving 4 times, Yamata-no-Orochi will begin preparing and summon a Serpent's Tail.
3. When a Serpent's Tail is defeated, all Phantom Thieves gain <color=#FF423F>Ame-no-Murakumo</color>, which greatly increases the damage of their next attack.

title: Yamata-no-Orochi
text: 4. When Yamata-no-Orochi is defeated, 4 Shadows appear.

title: Hecatoncheires
text:
1. At the start of the battle, Hecatoncheires has 100 <color=#FF423F>Arms of Protection</color> stacks, and takes less damage depending on the number of stacks.
When it has Arms of Protection, it also has <color=#FF423F>Arms of Defense</color>, reducing final damage by 70%.

title: Hecatoncheires
text:
2. Hecatoncheires will summon the Avatar of Arms and the Avatar of Gathering.
When the Avatar of Arms is defeated, it loses 1 stack of Arms of Protection. When the Avatar of Gathering is defeated, it loses 10 stacks of Arms of Protection.
For each stack of Arms of Protection removed, all Phantom Thieves gain <color=#FF423F>Arms of Strength</color>.
Arms of Strength: Damage increased based on number of stacks.

title: Hecatoncheires
text:
3. When Hecatoncheires has 80 or more Arms of Protection stacks, it becomes <color=#FF423F>invincible</color> and will not attack.
It keeps 4 Avatars of Arms on the field, and gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Arms of Might</color> stack every turn.
Arms of Might: Damage increased based on number of stacks.
4. When Hecatoncheires has less than 80 Arms of Protection stacks, it loses its invincibility and begins to attack. Every turn it summons 2 Avatars of Gathering.
When it takes damage, 1 Arms of Protection stack is removed.

title: Hecatoncheires
text:
5. When Arms of Protection reaches 0, Hecatoncheires enters the <color=#FF423F>Last Stand</color> state.
Last Stand: Damage is significantly increased, and attack pattern changes.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. Ara Mitama governs <color=#FF423F>courage</color>, Nigi Mitama governs <color=#FF423F>affection</color>, Saki Mitama governs <color=#FF423F>love</color>, and Kushi Mitama governs <color=#FF423F>wisdom</color>.
2. The four Mitama share a Soul Link, which distributes all damage received between all Shadows who share this condition, based on the percentage of their current HP.
3. According to the mysterious words, you must <color=#FF423F>select the corresponding Mitama to attack</color>.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. Thoth loves the number <color=#FF423F>50</color>, and at the end of each turn, it randomly gives itself a Count from 1-100.
The Phantom Thieves can increase or decrease the Count by attacking surrounding Shadows.
2. If the Count is close to 50 at the start of Thoth's turn, he will be happy and give the Phantom Thief some sort of benefit.
However, if he is not happy, he will give a penalty.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. At the start of battle, all Phantom Thieves will gain 10 stacks of Great Tengu Power.
Each stack increases Attack and Defense by 5%.
2. Every turn, as well as every time the Phantom Thief uses a skill, they lose 1 Great Tengu Power and Kurama Tengu gains 1 Great Tengu Power.
3. Kurama Tengu will summon Sudama, who will flee after 1 turn.
If Sudama is defeated, all Phantom Thieves gain 5 stacks of Great Tengu Power.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
1. Every turn, as well as every time the Phantom Thieves use a skill, the entire party gains 1 stack of Great Tengu Power.
2. When the Phantom Thieves take damage, they lose 3 stacks of Great Tengu Power.
3. When Great Tengu Power reaches a certain number of stacks, an additional effect is gained.
5 stacks: damage increases by 20%.
10 stacks: damage increases by 50%.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
Thoth selects 1 Phantom Thief and uses Elemental Cascade, inflicting <color=#FF423F>4 types of elemental ailments</color> on the target.
On the next turn, Thoth uses <color=#FF423F>Freidyne: Ultra</color> on that Phantom Thief.
This skill deals extra damage to targets with elemental ailments.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
Each time a Phantom Thief <color=#FF423F>gains a buff</color>, their damage increases by 10%.
Stacks up to 5 times.

title: The Velvet Trials
text:
Protecting the Queen's Necklace is the key to victory.
Restoring the Queen's Necklace's HP to the maximum will win the battle.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. When Decarabia takes <color=#FF423F>weakness damage</color>, it will permanently gain 1 <color=#FF423F>Weakness</color> stack.
Each stack increases Decarabia's damage taken.
2. When Decarabia takes damage from an attribute other than its weakness, it will immediately use <color=#FF423F>Agilao</color> against the attacker.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. When Decarabia takes <color=#FF423F>weak point damage</color>, it will permanently gain 1 <color=#FF423F>weakness</color>.
Each weakness increases Decarabia's damage taken.
2. When Decarabia takes damage from an attribute other than its weaknesses, it will immediately use <color=#FF423F>Agilao</color> on the attacker.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
3. At the start of battle, Decarabia will summon 1 Courageous Spirit.
4. When Courageous Spirit is present, <color=#FF423F>Decarabia's weak affinity will change</color>.
5. When Courageous Spirit is defeated, Decarabia's weak affinity will return to normal.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. On Leanan Sidhe's action, 1 random Shadow gains 3 stacks of <color=#FF423F>Fairy's Blessing</color>.
Fairy's Blessing: Significantly increases damage.
Lose 1 stack after taking damage.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
2. On Leanan Sidhe's action, for each Shadow with Fairy's Blessing, the count increases by 1.
When the count reaches 2, Fairy's Dance activates, dealing heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. On Leanan Sidhe's action, it gains 4 stacks of <color=#FF423F>Fairy's Blessing</color>.
It loses 1 stack when it takes damage.
2. On Leanan Sidhe's action, if it has Fairy's Blessing, it activates <color=#FF423F>Gift of the Grove</color>.
All Shadows' damage is significantly increased. Lasts for 2 turns.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. On Leanan Sidhe's action, Koppa Tengu gains 2 stacks of <color=#FF423F>Fairy's Blessing</color>.
Fairy's Blessing: Significantly increases damage.
Lose 1 stack after taking damage.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
2. When Koppa Tengu does not have Fairy's Blessing, Leanan Sidhe will grant it Fairy's Protection, which <color=#FF423F>nullifies all damage</color>.
The effect lasts until Leanan Sidhe's next action.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Matador's skillful footwork raises its evasion.
Mirage Step: 100% chance to avoid <color=#FF423F>normal attacks</color>.
Reverse Step: 100% chance to avoid <color=#FF423F>ranged attacks</color>.
Cape-Sweep Step: 100% chance to avoid <color=#FF423F>skill attacks</color>.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
2. At the end of each turn, Matador gains <color=#FF423F>1 random Step effect</color> and 3 Capote stacks.
It will lose 1 stack when taking damage.
3. If Matador has Capote when it takes action, it will use Estocada to deal heavy damage to 1 Phantom Thief.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Matador's skillful footwork raises its evasion.
Mirage Step: 100% chance to avoid <color=#FF423F>normal attacks</color>.
Reverse Step: 100% chance to avoid <color=#FF423F>ranged attacks</color>.
Cape-Sweep Step: 100% chance to avoid <color=#FF423F>skill attacks</color>.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
2. At the end of each turn, all Matadors gain<color=#FF423F>2 random Step effects</color> and 1 Capote stacks.
It will lose 1 stack when taking damage.
3. If Matador has Capote when it takes action, it will use Estocada to deal heavy damage to 1 Phantom Thief.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Matador has <color=#FF423F>Master Step</color>, granting a 100% chance to evade all attacks.
2. At regular intervals, Matador will summon Matador's Spirit, which will flee after 1 turn.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
3. When Matador's Spirit is defeated, Matador will lose its motivation, and also lose Master Step.
It will become unable to act for 2 turns.
After 2 turns, its motivation will return, and it will regain Master Step.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Matador's skillful footwork raises its evasion.
Mirage Step: 100% chance to avoid <color=#FF423F>normal attacks</color>.
Reverse Step: 100% chance to avoid <color=#FF423F>ranged attacks</color>.
Cape-Sweep Step: 100% chance to avoid <color=#FF423F>skill attacks</color>.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
2. At the start of battle, Matador gains <color=#FF423F>2 random Step effects</color>. After taking damage, it will change to 2 other random Step effects.
3. At the end of each turn, Matador gains 3 Capote stacks.
It loses 1 stack when taking damage.
4. If Matador has Capote when it takes action, it will use Estocada to deal heavy damage to 1 Phantom Thief.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Fuu-Ki's <color=#FF423F>Wind Domain</color> gives it a base chance of 80% to put the target in an <color=#FF423F>Ultrawindswept</color> state when attacking. Ultrawindswept lasts for 2 turns.
Ultrawindswept: An enhanced version of Windswept inflicted by Fuu-Ki. Decreases Defense by 24%.
2. Fuu-Ki deals increased damage to Phantom Thieves in the Ultrawindswept state.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
3. Sui-Ki's <color=#FF423F>Ice Domain</color> gives it a base chance of 80% to inflict <color=#FF423F>Ultrafreeze</color> when attacking. Ultrafreeze lasts for 2 turns.
Ultrafreeze: An enhanced version of Frozen inflicted by Sui-Ki. Decreases Attack Power by 24%.
4. Sui-Ki deals increased damage to Phantom Thieves in the Ultrafreeze state.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Kin-Ki's <color=#FF423F>Golden Domain</color> allows it to grant <color=#FF423F>Indestructible Vajra</color> to 1 random Shadow after dealing damage.
Indestructible Vajra: Nullifies the next damage taken.
2. When Kin-Ki has Indestructible Vajra, its damage increases.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Fuu-Ki's <color=#FF423F>Wind Domain</color> gives it a base chance of 80% to put the target in an <color=#FF423F>Ultrawindswept</color> state when attacking. Ultrawindswept lasts for 2 turns.
Ultrawindswept: An enhanced version of Windswept inflicted by Fuu-Ki. Decreases Defense by 24%.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
2. Sui-Ki's <color=#FF423F>Ice Domain</color> gives it a base chance of 80% to inflict <color=#FF423F>Ultrafreeze</color> when attacking. Ultrafreeze lasts for 2 turns.
Ultrafreeze: An enhanced version of Frozen inflicted by Sui-Ki. Decreases Attack Power by 24%.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
3. Kin-Ki's <color=#FF423F>Golden Domain</color> allows it to grant <color=#FF423F>Indestructible Vajra</color> to 1 random Shadow after dealing damage.
Indestructible Vajra: Nullifies the next damage taken.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
4. Ongyo-Ki starts with 3 <color=#FF423F>Damage Reduction</color> stacks, which increases the damage dealt to Phantom Thieves with elemental ailments.
5. When Fuu-Ki, Sui-Ki, or Kin-Ki are defeated, Ongyo-Ki loses 1 <color=#FF423F>Damage Reduction</color> stack. It then gains the Domain effect from the defeated Shadow, and its affinities change.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. When Shadows on the field use a certain skill, all Shadows gain <color=#FF423F>Legion</color>.
2. When Legion reaches 5 stacks, Power will activate a powerful multi-target skill.
3. When there are less than 2 Principalities on the field, Power will spend all Legion stacks to summon 2 Principalities.
It can summon a maximum of 2 times during the battle.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. When Ose activates <color=#FF423F>Revenge Stance</color>, it enters a Counterattack Stance and will counterattack when it takes damage. <color=#FF423F>Revenge Stance</color> lasts for 2 turns.
When a counterattack is successful, Attack increases.
2. After Revenge Stance ends, targets who took counterattacks from Ose will be Taunted.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Byakko's <color=#FF423F>Vicious Bite</color> skill will inflict <color=#FF423F>Deep Wounds</color> on all Phantom Thieves, decreasing their Defense and increasing their damage taken.
Use the Guard command to remove the Deep Wounds condition.
2. Byakko's <color=#FF423F>Sharp Claws</color> skill will target the Phantom Thief with the lowest HP, and if they have Deep Wounds, the damage is increased.
When this skill KO's a Phantom Thief, it immediately activates again.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. King Frost will not attack, but will continuously summon Jack Frost and Black Frost.
When all summoned Shadows are defeated, King Frost loses 30% HP.
2. The longer Jack Frost and Black Frost stay on the field, the more their Attack and Defense will increase.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. When Black Rider or Pale Rider take fatal damage, they survive with 1 HP and enter a <color=#FF423F>False Death</color> state.
If both enter the False Death state at the same time, they are defeated.
2. If either Black Rider or Pale Rider are in a False Death state at the start of the turn, the other will use a skill to revive them.
This will also increase their Attack and max HP.
3. Black Rider's ability, <color=#FF423F>Black Dance</color>: Increase the damage dealt by both Riders and decrease their damage taken.
Effect lasts until either Rider is defeated.
<color=#FF423F>Monochrome Rondeau: Black</color>: After reviving 2 or more times, the Riders will activate Monochrome Rondeau: Black, dealing heavy multi-target damage and inflicting Forget on the Phantom Thief with the lowest current HP.
4. Pale Rider's ability, <color=#FF423F>White Dance</color>: Deals a set amount of damage to the Phantom Thief with the lowest Defense, and locks on.
<color=#FF423F>Monochrome Rondeau: White</color>: On the next turn after using White Dance, deals heavy damage to the Phantom Thief that was locked on to, if neither Rider is in the False Death state.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Surt has the ability <color=#FF423F>Ragnarok</color>: All Shadows besides Surt have their max HP decreased by 20% each turn.
2. When Surt's HP is below 15%, it goes Berserk, restoring 20% of its HP and increasing its Attack by 20%.
If it still survives after 3 turns, it activates <color=#FF423F>Blazing Apocalypse</color>, and KO's all Phantom Thieves.
3. When Valkyrie is defeated, Surt gains <color=#FF423F>Valkyrie's Blessing</color>, increasing its damage.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Each time Gabriel loses 33% of its max HP, it summons Dominion.
When Dominion is on the field, all of Gabriel's affinities change to Resist.
2. When Gabriel's HP falls below 33%, it summons 2 Powers every 3 turns.
3. When Power is on the field, all of Gabriel's affinities change to Null.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
When either Oberon or Titania is defeated, the other will be unable to act for 2 turns.
After they recover, their damage will be <color=#FF423F>significantly increased</color>.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Dominion, Power, Principality, and Archangel are in the <color=#FF423F>Soul Link</color> state, and also have the <color=#FF423F>Sanctuary</color> state.
Soul Link: When a Shadow with Soul Link takes damage, split the damage between all Shadows with Soul Link, based on its current HP.
Sanctuary: Increase damage taken by 6% per <color=#FF423F>debuff</color> inflicted, up to 30%.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Cu Chulainn's <color=#FF423F>critical damage taken</color> is increased by 30%, and its non-critical damage taken is decreased by 50%.
2. Upon activating Heroic Strength, Cu Chulainn gains a set amount of shield, increases its damage dealt and locks on to 1 Phantom Thief.
On the next turn, it unleashes <color=#FF423F>Gae Bolg</color> on that Phantom Thief, dealing heavy damage and inflicting an insta-kill effect.
If Cu Chulainn's <color=#FF423F>shield is broken</color>, it loses Heroic Strength and the lock on is canceled.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. When Yamata-no-Orochi's HP reaches 0, it revives with new affinities and skills. It can revive up to 4 times.
2. After reviving 4 times, Yamata-no-Orochi will begin preparing and summon a Serpent's Tail.
3. When a Serpent's Tail is defeated, all Phantom Thieves gain <color=#FF423F>Ame-no-Murakumo</color>, which greatly increases the damage of their next attack.
4. When Yamata-no-Orochi is defeated, 4 Shadows appear.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. When Arahabaki and Take-Minakata take damage from a skill, Resonance, or Highlight, they will record the attribute of the damage taken. (If damage from multiple attribute types is taken in the same turn, an attribute is recorded at random).
2. When Arahabaki takes damage of the <color=#FF423F>same attribute</color> it previously recorded, its <color=#FF423F>damage taken increases</color>.
This effect can stack.
 When Arahabaki takes damage of a different attribute than the one it recorded, the increased damage taken effect is removed, and Arahabaki's damage increases.
3.When Take-Minakata takes damage of a <color=#FF423F>different attribute</color> than what it previously recorded, its <color=#FF423F>damage taken increases</color>.
This effect can stack.
When Take-Minakata takes damage of the same attribute as the one it recorded, the increased damage taken effect is removed, and Take-Minakata's damage increases.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
During battle, Kohryu will summon Shade of Seiryu, Shade of Byakko, Shade of Suzaku, and Shade of Genbu.
When a Shadow is summoned, its corresponding <color=#FF423F>Might</color> is granted to all Shadows on the field.
When a Shadow is defeated, the Shadows lose that Might and it is granted to all Phantom Thieves instead.
Seiryu's Might: Grants a shield equal to 10% of max HP every turn.
Byakko's Might: Increases Attack by 20%.
Suzaku's Might: Increases damage dealt by 20%.
Genbu's Might: Increases Defense by 20%.

title: The Three Fates
text:
1. Clotho uses Moirai Binding to grant a random Phantom Thief a Thread of Fate.
2. Lachesis uses Moirai Spinning to change a Phantom Thief's Thread of Fate to <color=#FF423F>Weave of Fate</color>.
3. At certain times, Clotho, Lachesis and Atropos will summon a Spirit of Fate.
Defeating the Spirit of Fate will grant an <color=#FF423F>additional buff</color> to Phantom Thieves with a Weave of Fate.
4. At certain times, Atropos will use <color=#FF423F>Moirai Cutting</color>, dealing severe damage to Phantom Thieves with the Weave of Fate.
(1) After Atropos has acted 10 times.
(2) After Clotho or Lachesis have been defeated.
(3) After Atropos has been defeated.

title: Hecatoncheires
text:
1. At the start of the battle, Hecatoncheires has 100 <color=#FF423F>Arms of Protection</color> stacks, and takes less damage depending on the number of stacks. When it has Arms of Protection, it also has <color=#FF423F>Arms of Defense</color>, reducing final damage by 70%.
2. Hecatoncheires will summon the Avatar of Arms and the Avatar of Gathering.
When the Avatar of Arms is defeated, it loses 1 Arms of Protection stack. When the Avatar of Gathering is defeated, it loses 10 Arms of Protection stacks.
For each Arms of Protection stack removed, all Phantom Thieves gain <color=#FF423F>Arms of Strength</color>.
Arms of Strength: Damage increased based on number of stacks.
3. When Hecatoncheires has 80 or more Arms of Protection stacks, it becomes invincible and will not attack.
It keeps 4 Avatars of Arms on the field, and gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Arms of Might</color> stack every turn.
Arms of Might: Damage increased based on number of stacks.
4. When Hecatoncheires has less than 80 Arms of Protection stacks, it loses its invincibility and begins to attack. Every turn it summons 2 Avatars of Gathering.
When it takes damage, 1 Arms of Protection stack is removed.
5. When Arms of Protection reaches 0, Hecatoncheires enters the <color=#FF423F>Last Stand</color> state.
Last Stand: Damage is significantly increased, and attack pattern changes.

title: Combat Chip
text:
<color=#FF423F>Combat Chips</color>:
1. At the end of each turn, the Phantom Thieves receive 3 <color=#FF423F>Deployment Points</color>.
2. After reaching 20 Deployment Points, automatically spend 20 Deployment Points to summon 1 <color=#FF423F>Self-Destruct Bot</color> and 1 <color=#FF423F>Combat Drone </color>(number can increase depending on equipment), which will attack the enemy.
3. Each Combat Chip has special effects.

title: Combat Drones
text:
<color=#FF423F>Combat Drones</color>:
1. For each Bot equipped, gain 1 Combat Drone, and 1 more <color=#FF423F>Glitch</color> can be removed.
2. Each Combat Drone has special effects.

title: Self-Destruct Bot
text:
<color=#FF423F>Self-Destruct Bots</color>:
1. For each Bot equipped, gain 1 extra Self-Destruct Bot, and increase Self-Destruct Bots' <color=#FF423F>Almighty</color> damage dealt by 100%.
2. Each Self-Destruct Bot has special effects.
