title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Jikokuten starts the battle with 10 Down Points.
Every 2 turns, it activates <color=#FF423F>Blade of Sanctuary</color>, granting itself 10 Down Points, and granting 1 Down Point to all Shadows.
When Jikokuten's Down Points reach 36, it transforms into <color=#FF423F>Asura</color>, greatly enhancing its abilities.
2. Jikokuten constantly summons various Shadows.
When a Shadow is defeated, Jikokuten's Down Points are reduced by 3.
3. Victory is acheived by reducing Jikokuten's Down Points to 0, or by defeating all foes.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Jikokuten starts the battle with 20 Down Points, and gains 4 Down Points every turn.
When Jikokuten's Down Points reach 36, it transforms into <color=#FF423F>Asura</color>, greatly increasing its stats.
2. Jikokuten summons 4 Mitama every 3 turns.
The Mitama will flee after 1 turn.
When a Mitama is defeated, Jikokuten's Down Points are reduced by 3, and one of its affinities becomes Weak for 3 turns: Fire, Ice, Electric, or Wind.
3. Victory is acheived by reducing Jikokuten's Down Points to 0, or by defeating all foes.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Jikokuten starts the battle with 30 Down Points, all affinities set to Null, and gains 3 extra Down Points every turn.
When Jikokuten's Down Points reach 36, it transforms into <color=#FF423F>Asura</color>, greatly increasing its stats.
2. At the start of battle, Jikokuten spends 6 Down Points to summon Jikokuten's Spirit.
3. Jikokuten's Spirit has 4 Down Points. Each turn, 4 of its weaknesses change.
If it is knocked down or defeated, it is affected by Soul Break: Jikokuten loses 10 Down Points, and all its affinities change to Weak (excluding Physical and Gun).
After some time, Jikokuten then resummons Jikokuten's Spirit.
4. Victory is acheived by reducing Jikokuten's Down Points to 0, or by defeating all foes.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Each turn, Kikuri-Hime will use a random Arbiter's Power on the Phantom Thieves, forbidding them from taking certain actions.
If a Phantom Thief defies the arbitration, they gain 1 Seal of Mortality. If a Phantom Thief gains 2 Seal of Mortality stacks, they are KO'd.
Arbitration - Survival: Healing and Defense skills must not be used.
Arbitration - Attack: Attack skills must not be used.
Arbitration - Support: Buff and Debuff skills must not be used.
If all Phantom Thieves obey the arbitration, Kikuri-Hime will grant all Phantom Thieves a damage-boosting effect.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
At the start of the battle, Kikuri-Hime activates Border of Life and Death, greatly reducing the HP of all Phantom Thieves and activating Arbitration - Survival for 2 turns.
Afterwards, it activates Arbitration - Attack and Arbitration - Support for all Phantom Thieves.
In addition, every 2 turns, Kikuri-Hime will use a random Arbiter's Power on the Phantom Thieves, forbidding them from taking certain actions.
If the Phantom Thieves defy the arbitration, they receive 1 Seal of Mortality, and if they receive 2 seals, they are KO'd.
Arbitration - Survival: If Healing and Defense skills or Highlights are used, receive 1 Seal of Mortality.
Arbitration - Attack: If Attack skills or Highlights are used, receive 1 Seal of Mortality.
Arbitration - Support: If Buff and Debuff skills or Highlights are used, receive 1 Seal of Mortality.
If all Phantom Thieves obey the arbitration, Kikuri-Hime will grant all Phantom Thieves a damage increase effect.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Every 3 turns, Kikuri-Hime will activate Bond of Death, randomly KO'ing 1 Phantom Thief.
It also uses a random Arbiter's Power on the other Phantom Thieves, forbidding them from taking certain actions.
If the Phantom Thieves defy the arbitration, they receive 1 Seal of Mortality, and if they receive 2 seals, they are KO'd.
Arbitration - Survival: If Healing and Defense skills or Highlights are used, receive 1 Seal of Mortality.
Arbitration - Attack: If Attack skills or Highlights are used, receive 1 Seal of Mortality.
Arbitration - Support: If Buff and Debuff skills or Highlights are used, receive 1 Seal of Mortality.
If all Phantom Thieves obey the arbitration, Kikuri-Hime will revive the KO'd Phantom Thief.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Zouchouten has Growth of All Things, and each turn grants Growth to 1 Shadow.
2. If Jack Frost receives Growth, it becomes King Frost. If King Frost receives Growth, it becomes <color=#FF423F>Black Frost</color>, and summons 1 Jack-o'-Lantern.
When Jack-o'-Lantern is defeated, Black Frost reverts to Jack Frost.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Zouchouten has <color=#FF423F>Growth of All Things</color>, which grants Growth to 2 random Shadows each turn.
Each stack of Growth increases Attack by 30%.
2. Zouchouten will absorb Growth from the Shadows every 3 turns. When it reaches 4 stacks of Growth, it will unleash a powerful attack.
3. When a Shadow with Growth is defeated, its stack of Growth disappears.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Zouchouten has <color=#FF423F>Growth of All Things</color>, and every turn grants Growth to 1 random Shadow and 1 random Phantom Thief.
Each stack of Growth increases damage dealt by 30%, but also increases damage taken by 30%.
2. When a target with Growth is defeated, the attacker takes their Growth.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Zouchouten has <color=#FF423F>Growth of All Things</color>. It starts with 10 stacks of Growth, and each turn gains 5-8 stacks of Growth, up to a maximum of 30.
2. When Zouchouten takes damage, it loses 1 stack of Growth.
If its stacks of Growth fall below 8, it immediately grants itself 10 stacks of Growth.
3. After 4 turns, or when Growth has reached 20 stacks, it transforms into <color=#FF423F>Asura</color>, greatly enhancing its abilities.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Arahabaki summons a variety of Dogu.
When Dogu are on the field, Arahabaki is granted various effects.
2. At the start of Arahabaki's turn, Arahabaki's Progress increases for each Dogu on the field.
When Progress reaches 10, Arahabaki activates <color=#FF423F>Abyssal Gaze</color> and inflicts all Phantom Thieves with <color=#FF423F>Despair</color>.
3. At the start of the battle or when its HP falls below 50%, Arahabaki summons 1 of each of the 4 types of Dogu.
Weakness Dogu: Protects Arahabaki's weakness
When defeated, several of Arahabaki's affinities change to Weak.
SP Dogu: Causes the Phantom Thieves to lose SP each turn.
When defeated, the Phantom Thieves regain SP.
HP Dogu: Restores Arahabkaki's HP each turn. When defeated, the Phantom Thieves regain HP.
Progress Dogu: Increases Arahabaki's Progress each turn.
When defeated, Arahabaki's Progress decreases.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Arahabaki summons a variety of Dogu.
When Dogu are on the field, Arahabaki is granted various effects.
2. At the start of Arahabaki's turn, Arahabaki's Progress increases for each Dogu on the field.
When Progress reaches 10, Arahabaki activates <color=#FF423F>Abyssal Gaze</color> and inflicts all Phantom Thieves with <color=#FF423F>Despair</color>.
3. Arahabaki will randomly summon 2 Dogu each turn.
When its HP falls below 50%, Arahabaki summons an additional of Dogu.
Weakness Dogu: Protects Arahabaki's weakness
When defeated, several of Arahabaki's affinities change to Weak.
SP Dogu: Causes the Phantom Thieves to lose SP each turn.
When defeated, the Phantom Thieves regain SP.
HP Dogu: Restores Arahabkaki's HP each turn. When defeated, the Phantom Thieves regain HP.
Progress Dogu: Increases Arahabaki's Progress each turn.
When defeated, Arahabaki's Progress decreases.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Arahabaki summons a variety of Dogu. When Dogu are on the field, Arahabaki is granted various effects.
2. At the start of Arahabaki's turn, Arahabaki's Progress increases for each Dogu on the field. When Progress reaches 10, Arahabaki activates Abyssal Gaze and inflicts all Phantom Thieves with <color=#ff3b37>Despair</color>.
3. There is always a Metamorphosis Dogu on the field. This Dogu cannot be attacked, and it will transform into another Dogu randomly every turn, activating its corresponding ability.
4. When it HP falls below 50% for the first time, Arahabaki summons an additional Metamorphosis Dogu.
Weakness Dogu: Protects Arahabaki's weakness.
SP Dogu: Causes the Phantom Thieves to lose SP each turn.
HP Dogu: Restores Arahabkaki's HP each turn.
Progress Dogu: Increases Arahabaki's Progress each turn.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Setanta will transform into <color=#FF423F>Cu Chulainn</color> under certain circumstances.
2. Cu Chulainn will lock on to 1 Phantom Thief, and will activate <color=#FF423F>Gae Bolg</color> on the next turn, dealing heavy damage and inflicting an insta-kill effect.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Leanan Sidhe grants 1 Growth stack to Setanta every turn. When Growth reaches 3 stacks, Setanta transforms into <color=#FF423F>Cu Chulainn</color>.
2. When Leanan Sidhe is defeated, Setanta gains 3 Growth stacks.
3. Cu Chulainn will lock on to 1 Phantom Thief, and will activate <color=#FF423F>Gae Bolg</color> on the next turn, dealing heavy damage and granting an insta-kill effect.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Take-Minakata deals more damage the lower its HP is.
2. Whenever Take-Minakata uses a skill, it loses 20% of its current HP, and gains a shield equal to 20% of its max HP.
3. Every 3 turns, Take-Minakata summons 1 War God's Spirit. If it is defeated in 1 turn, all Phantom Thieves' Attack is increased.
If it is not defeated in 1 turn, Take-Minakata absorbs the War God's Spirit, and gains a shield equal to 50% of its max HP.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Take-Minakata deals more damage the lower its HP is.
2. Take-Minakata will take 90% of the damage for other Shadows, and when it receives fatal damage, it will instead enter an Endure state, its HP will be fixed at 1, and will die after 2 turns.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Take-Minakata deals more damage the lower its HP is.
2. When Take-Minakata's HP is low, it will summon 4 War God's Spirits, and after 1 turn absorb all of them.
For each one absorbed, it restores 25% of its max HP.
If the Phantom Thieves defeat all of the War God's Spirits, Take-Minakata will be defeated.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Thoth is the god of the Moon, and Horus is the god of the Sun.
They govern over day and night respectively. If Thoth is attacked, it will become night. If Horus is attacked, it will become day.
2. During the day, Thoth's damage dealt is decreased by 70%, and its damage taken is increased by 70%.
At night, its damage dealt is increased by 70%, and its damage taken is decreased by 70%.
The effects of day and night on Horus are the opposite.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Each turn, Thoth's affinity will change to Drain either an elemental attribute (Fire, Ice, Electric, or Wind) or spiritual attribute (Psychokinesis, Nuclear, Bless, or Curse). When it takes damage of a corresponding attribute group, it gains 1 Lunar Power stack.
2. When Thoth has 2 or more Lunar Power stacks, it will spend 2 Lunar Power stacks to enter the <color=#FF423F>Full Moon</color> state, increasing its own abilities and summoning 2 Sandmen.
3. Every 3 turns, Thoth will use Full Moon's Protection, entering a preparation state and gaining a shield.
If the shield is destroyed before the next turn, the preparation is canceled. If it is not destroyed, Thoth immediately enters the Full Moon state.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. The moon changes phases, starting with New Moon.
It follows a sequence of New Moon, Waxing Crescent, Full Moon, and Waning Crescent.
2. Depending on the phase of the moon, Thoth gains the following effects.
New Moon: Damage dealt decreases by 50%, and damage taken increases by 50%.
Waxing Crescent: Damage dealt increases by 50%, and damage taken increases by 50%.
Full Moon: Damage dealt increases by 50%, and damage taken decreases by 50%.
Waning Crescent: Damage dealt decreases by 50%, and damage taken decreases by 50%.
3. When a Clock is on the field, and it is attacked by different attributes, the phase of the moon will change.
Fire, Ice, Electric, and Wind attacks will change the phase in the usual order.
Psychokinesis, Nuclear, Bless and Curse attacks will change the phase in reverse order.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. The day and night cycle switches every turn.
During the day, SP cost is greatly increased and damage is increased.
At night, all units enter a <color=#FF423F>Deep Sleep</color>state.
Deep Sleep: Unable to act, and restore 20% of max HP and 20% of max SP every turn.
2. At night, Thoth summons 1 Sandman.
Each Sandman on the field extends the duration of night by 1 turn.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Jikokuten has <color=#FF423F>Blade of Sanctuary</color>.
Blade of Sanctuary: Each time damage is dealt, also grants a shield to 1 random Shadow.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Zouchouten can activate <color=#FF423F>Growth of All Things</color>.
Growth of All Things: Randomly increases Attack, Defense, or damage of all Shadows each turn.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Koumokuten can activate <color=#FF423F>Eye of Heaven</color>.
Eye of Heaven: Selects 1 Phantom Thief. Increases their damage taken and has Shadows focus attacks on them next turn.
2. After activating Eye of Heaven, Koumokuten will summon 1 Makami.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Bishamonten can activate <color=#FF423F>Parasol of Chaos</color>.
Parasol of Chaos: Covers the Shadow with the lowest HP percentage, and changes all affinities to Drain. Lasts for 2 turns.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Jikokuten has <color=#FF423F>Blade of Sanctuary</color>.
Blade of Sanctuary: Each time damage is dealt, also grants a shield to 1 random Shadow.
2. Zouchouten can activate <color=#FF423F>Growth of All Things</color>.
Growth of All Things: Randomly increases Attack, Defense, or damage of all Shadows each turn.
3. Koumokuten can activate <color=#FF423F>Eye of Heaven</color>.
Eye of Heaven: Selects 1 Phantom Thief.
Increases their damage taken and has Shadows focus attacks on them next turn.
4. Bishamonten has <color=#FF423F>Parasol of Chaos</color>.
Parasol of Chaos: Covers the Shadow with the lowest HP, and changes all elemental affinities to Drain.
Lasts for 2 turns.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
5. When only 1 of the Four Heavenly Kings remains, it transforms into <color=#FF423F>Asura</color>, and restores 30% HP.
6. Asura has the skills of all Four Heavenly Kings, so fight with caution.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Dominion, Power, Principality, and Archangel are in the <color=#ff3b37>Soul Link</color> state.
Soul Link: When a Shadow with Soul Link takes damage, split the damage between all Shadows with Soul Link, based on its current HP.
Dominion will summon continuous waves of Angels. When an Angel is defeated, SP is restored.
Dominion will summon continuous waves of Angels. When an Angel is defeated, SP is restored.
When Dominion is Weakened, damage dealt to Angels is added to your score.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Dominion summons continuous waves of Angels. When an Angel is defeated, SP is restored.
When you deal damage to Angels summoned by Dominion, your score increases.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
During battle, Kohryu will summon Shade of Seiryu, Shade of Byakko, Shade of Suzaku, and Shade of Genbu.
When a Shadow is summoned, its corresponding Might is granted to all Shadows on the field.
When a Shadow is defeated, the Shadows lose that Might and it is granted to all Phantom Thieves instead.
Seiryu's Might: Grants a shield equal to 10% of max HP every turn.
Byakko's Might: Increases Attack by 20%.
Suzaku's Might: Increases damage dealt by 20%.
Genbu's Might: Increases Defense by 20%.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. After the Phantom Thieves land 3 critical hits with their skills, the Phantom Thief with the highest Attack can act for 1 extra turn, and their critical rate and critical damage are increased.
2. Oberon and Titania are in the <color=#FF423F>Soul Link</color> state.
Soul Link: Distributes all damage received between all Shadows who share this condition, based on the percentage of their current HP.
3. Every 2 turns, Oberon's damage taken increases, then gradually decreases.
Every 2 turns, Titania's damage taken decreases, then gradually increases.
4. Oberon will summon Sudama, which will attempt to flee.
If Sudama is defeated, the Phantom Thief with the highest Attack will be able to act for 1 extra turn, and their critical rate and critical damage are increased.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Surt grants <color=#FF423F>Ragnarok</color> to Shadows every turn.
Ragnarok: Increase damage by 5%, and lose a set amount of HP each turn.
Stacks up to 10 times.
2. When Baphomet is defeated, Surt loses a certain amount of HP.
3. When Weakened, Surt will grant 5 stacks of Ragnarok to all Phantom Thieves, and summon 4 Jack-o'-Lanterns.
Damage dealt to Jack-o'-Lanterns is added to your score.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Surt grants 2 <color=#FF423F>Ragnarok</color> stacks to all Shadows every turn.
Ragnarok: Increase damage by 5%, and lose a set amount of HP each turn.
Stacks up to 10 times.
2. Damage dealt to the Jack-o'-Lanterns is added to your score.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
When Vishnu's HP falls below 90%/60% for the first time, it summons 2 Avatars.
The Avatars and Vishnu's main body are in the <color=#FF423F>Soul Link</color> state.
Soul Link: Distributes all damage received between all Shadows who share this condition, based on the percentage of their current HP.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Vishnu's Avatars and its main body are in the <color=#FF423F>Soul Link</color> state.
Soul Link: Distributes all damage received between all Shadows who share this condition, based on the percentage of their current HP.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Atavaka has different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
When Atavaka takes damage from a skill, it gains a Mark based on that skill's <color=#FF423F>attribute</color>.
The maximum number of Marks is 7.
When it has collected 3 Marks of the same attribute, Atavaka spends all Marks to summon a Rakshasa.
When Rakshasa is defeated, the corresponding attribute damage of all Phantom Thieves is increased.
Atavaka can summon Rakshasa up to 2 times.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Yatsufusa will activate <color=#FF423F>Eight Beads of Virtue</color>.
Eight Beads of Virtue: All affinities change to Resist, damage dealt increases, and damage taken decreases.
It also summons 4 Shadows.
When a Shadow is defeated, Yatsufusa is inflicted with the corresponding elemental ailment for 2 turns.
Summoned Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
2. When Yatsufusa is in the Eight Beads of Virtue state and is inflicted with all 4 types of elemental ailments, the Eight Beads of Virtue state is canceled and its Defense decreases.
3. When Yatsufusa is Weakened, all Shadows vanish, and the Eight Beads of Virtue state is canceled.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Yatsufusa will activate <color=#FF423F>Eight Beads of Virtue</color>.
Eight Beads of Virtue: All affinities change to Resist, damage dealt increases, and damage taken decreases.
It also summons 4 Shadows.
When a Shadow is defeated, Yatsufusa is inflicted with the corresponding elemental ailment for 2 turns.
Summoned Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
2. When Yatsufusa is in the Eight Beads of Virtue state and is inflicted with all 4 types of elemental ailments, the Eight Beads of Virtue state is canceled and its Defense decreases.
3. When Yatsufusa is Weakened, all Shadows vanish, and the Eight Beads of Virtue state is canceled.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. At the start of battle, Mara summons 4 Decarabias.
2. Mara maintains 4 Decarabias on the field.
3. When Decarabia is defeated, Mara loses a certain amount of HP.
4. When Weakened, damage dealt to Decarabia is added to your score.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Nidhoggr and Yurlungur have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
1. Nidhoggr and all other Shadows are in the <color=#FF423F>Soul Link</color> state.
Soul Link: Distributes all damage received between all Shadows who share this condition, based on the percentage of their current HP.
2. When Nidhoggr and other Shadows use skills, all skill targets are inflicted with 1 stack of <color=#FF423F>Poison</color>.
Poison: At the end of a Phantom Thief's action, lose a certain amount of HP for each stack, but also increase Attack by 10%.
Poison cannot be dispelled and can stack up to 3 times.
3. When Weakened, damage dealt to foes is added to your score.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Nidhoggr and Yurlungur have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
1. Nidhoggr and all other Shadows are in the <color=#FF423F>Soul Link</color> state.
Soul Link: Distributes all damage received between all Shadows who share this condition, based on the percentage of their current HP.
2. When Nidhoggr and other Shadows use skills, all skill targets are inflicted with 1 stack of <color=#FF423F>Poison.
Poison: At the end of a turn, Phantom thieves lose a certain amount of HP for each stack, but also increase their Attack by 10%.
Poison cannot be dispelled and can stack up to 3 times.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. When Baal takes skill damage or receives a debuff, it gains 1 stack of <color=#FF423F>Decline</color>.
Decline: Decreases Defense. Lasts 3 turns.
Stacks up to 15 times.
2. Baal will start preparing, and on the next turn, uses <color=#FF423F>Divine Spear of Baal</color>, dealing heavy damage to 1 target.
If Decline reaches 10 stacks while preparing, the preparation is canceled and the attack changes to Cleave.
Baal's single-target attacks will prioritize Assassin or Sweeper Phantom Thieves.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Kartikeya leads its army of birds to attack all at once.
2. When Garuda and Jatayu take damage from a Phantom Thief, that Thief's damage increases by 4%.
Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 5 times.
When Horus and Yatagarasu take damage from a Phantom Thief, that Thief's pierce rate increases by 2%.
Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 5 times.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
When Oumitsunu takes damage from a skill, Highlight, or Resonance, the damage of the corresponding attribute increases by 6%.
Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 8 times.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Anubis has no weaknesses or resistances. Angel and Succubus have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
1. When Angel takes damage, Anubis gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Judgment of Evil</color>.
2. When Succubus takes damage, Anubis gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Judgment of Good</color>.
3.Judgment of Good and Judgment of Evil <color=#FF423F>negate</color> each other.
4. When either Judgment of Good or Judgment of Evil reach 5 stacks, Anubis will use <color=#FF423F>Advent of Judgment</color>, dealing heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves.
5. If Angel does not take any damage for 1 turn, it will use <color=#FF423F>Angel Healing</color> to restore HP to all Shadows.
6. If Succubus does not take any damage for 1 turn, it will use <color=#FF423F>Succubus Lullaby</color>, which has a 75% chance to put 2 random Phantom Thieves to Sleep.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. When Anubis receives a debuff, it gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Judgment of Evil</color>.
2. When Anubis receives a buff, it gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Judgment of Good</color>.
3.Judgment of Good and Judgment of Evil <color=#FF423F>negate</color> each other.
4. When either Judgment of Good or Judgment of Evil reach 5 stacks, Anubis will use <color=#FF423F>Advent of Judgment</color>, dealing heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves.
5. At the start of each turn, Anubis will summon 1 Saki Mitama.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Anubis has no weaknesses or resistances.
1. When Phantom Thieves use debuffs or attack skills, Anubis gains <color=#FF423F>Judgment of Evil</color>.
2. When Phantom Thieves use buffs or recovery skills, Anubis gains <color=#FF423F>Judgment of Good</color>.
3. Judgment of Good and Judgment of Evil <color=#FF423F>negate</color> each other.
4. When either Judgment of Good or Judgment of Evil reach 5 stacks, Anubis activates <color=#FF423F>Advent of Judgment</color>, dealing heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Hariti has no weaknesses or resistances.
1. Hariti has extremely high damage reduction, making it difficult to deal damage with direct attacks.
2. When Hariti's turn ends, it spends its own HP to fully heal all other Shadows, losing HP equal to the amount healed.
3. At the start of Hariti's turn, it summons 1 Agathion.
Hariti's damage increases by 15% for each Agathion on the field.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Hariti has no weaknesses or resistances.
1. Hariti has extremely high damage reduction, making it difficult to deal damage with direct attacks.
2. When Hariti's turn ends, it spends its own HP to fully heal all other Shadows, losing HP equal to the amount healed.
3. When Jack-o'-Lantern is defeated, Hariti immediately deals heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves.
4. At the start of Hariti's turn, it summons up to 4 Jack-o'-Lanterns.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Hariti, Jack Frost, and Black Frost have no weaknesses or resistances.
1. Hariti has extremely high damage reduction, making it difficult to deal damage with direct attacks.
2. When Hariti's turn ends, it spends its own HP to fully heal all other Shadows, losing HP equal to the amount healed.
3. Each turn, Hariti summons 1 Jack Frost, and grants <color=#FF423F>Mother's Love</color> to a random Jack Frost.
4. A Jack Frost with Mother's Love will transform into Black Frost after 2 turns, and will become unable to receive healing effects.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. At the end of each turn, Hell Biker will inflict <color=#FF423F>Hellscorched</color> on a random Phantom Thief.
Hellscorched: Lose a large amount of HP at the end of each turn.
Can be removed after taking <color=#FF423F>Ice</color> damage.
Stacks up to 3 times.
2. Jack Frost will not attack unprovoked and cannot be defeated.
When damaged, he will immediately use <color=#FF423F>Bufu</color> on the attacker, dealing a small amount of <color=#FF423F>Ice</color> damage.
3. When Hell Biker is defeated, you win the battle.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. At the end of each turn, Hell Biker will inflict <color=#FF423F>Hellscorched</color> on a random Phantom Thief.
Hellscorched: Lose a large amount of HP at the end of each turn.
Can be removed after taking <color=#FF423F>Ice</color> damage.
Stacks up to 3 times.
2. Jack Frost will not attack unprovoked and cannot be defeated.
When damaged, he will immediately use <color=#FF423F>Bufu</color> on the attacker, dealing a small amount of <color=#FF423F>Ice</color> damage.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. At the start of battle, Unicorn gains 5 stacks of Purity.
2. When Unicorn receives a buff or healing, it gains 1 extra stack of Purity.
Purity: Increases Attack and Defense. When Purity reaches 10 stacks, Unicorn activates <color=#FF423F>Holy Power</color>.
Holy Power deals heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves and fully restores all Shadows' HP.
3. Every turn, Unicorn randomly summons Nigi Mitama, Saki Mitama, Kushi Mitama, or Ara Mitama, which each grant Unicorn various buffs.
4. When Unicorn takes <color=#FF423F>debuffs</color>, it loses 2 stacks of Purity.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. At the start of the battle, Unicorn gains 5 stacks of Purity.
2. When Unicorn is healed or receives a buff, it also gains 1 stack of Purity.
Purity: Increases Attack and Defense, and when Purity reaches 10 stacks, Unicorn activates <color=#FF423F>Holy Power</color>.
Holy Power deals heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves, and fully heals all Shadows.
3. If there are less than 4 Mitama on the field, Unicorn will spend 3 Purity to summon 1 Mitama.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Daisoujou cannot be targeted or defeated.
2. At the start of the battle, Daisoujou's HP is only 1% of the maximum, and each turn it will use <color=#FF423F>Sokushin</color>.
Sokushin: Deals damage to all Phantom Thieves based on their current HP percentage, and consumes a certain amount of SP. Also restores the same amount of HP to Daisoujou.
3. Shadows will continously appear on the field, and deal a set amount of damage to Daisoujou.
4. Victory is acheived if Daisoujou's HP is healed to 100%.
The battle is lost if Daisoujou's HP is too low. Quickly defeat the Shadows while protecting Daisoujou.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Daisoujou cannot be targeted or defeated.
2. Shadows and Sarasvati will appear on the field. Shadows will deal a set amount of damage to Daisoujou, and Sarasvati will heal Daisoujou.
3. At the start of the battle, Daisoujou has 1% of its max HP. Victory is acheived if Daisoujou's HP is healed to 100%.
The battle is lost if Daisoujou's HP is too low. Be mindful of Daisoujou's remaining HP.
4. Quickly defeat the Shadows while protecting Sarasvati.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
White Rider will use <color=#FF423F>White Pestilence</color>.
White Pestilence: All Phantom Thieves lose a certain amount of HP, and 3 random Phantom Thieves are inflicted with <color=#FF423F>Pestilence</color>, causing them to lose a certain amount of HP each turn.
Lasts for 3 turns and stacks up to 5 times.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Red Rider will use <color=#FF423F>Red War</color>.
Red War: Increases damage of all Shadows.
Can be stacked. Also, has a chance to inflict <color=#FF423F>Rage</color> on 2 random Phantom Thieves.
Lasts for 2 turns.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Trumpeter cannot be targeted and will not attack.
2. Trumpeter will use <color=#FF423F>Horn of the End</color> to instantly activate other Shadows' skills.
3. If all other Shadows are defeated, Trumpeter will become targetable and begin preparing the <color=#FF423F>Horn of Ruin</color> for 2 turns.
Horn of Ruin: Sacrifices self to resummon all defeated Shadows, greatly strengthening their abilities and dealing heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Black Rider will use <color=#FF423F>Black Famine</color>.
Black Famine: Inflicts Famine on all targets, decreasing their Attack and increasing the cost of skills. Lasts for 1 turn. Stacks up to 2 times.
2. Pale Rider will use <color=#FF423F>Pale Death</color>.
Pale Death: Deals damage based on current HP percentage to 1 target, and inflicts <color=#FF423F>Despair</color>. Lasts for 3 turns.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. White Rider will use <color=#FF423F>White Pestilence</color>.
White Pestilence: All Phantom Thieves lose a certain amount of HP, and 3 random Phantom Thieves are inflicted with <color=#FF423F>Pestilence</color>, causing them to lose a certain amount of HP each turn. Lasts for 3 turns and stacks up to 5 times.
.
2. Red Rider will use <color=#FF423F>Red War</color>.
Red War: Increases damage of all Shadows. Can be stacked. It also has a chance to inflict <color=#FF423F>Rage</color> on 2 random Phantom Thieves. Lasts for 2 turns.
3. Black Rider will use <color=#FF423F>Black Famine</color>.
Black Famine: Inflicts Famine on all targets, decreasing their Attack and increasing the cost of skills. Lasts for 1 turn and stacks up to 2 times.
.
4. Pale Rider will use <color=#FF423F>Pale Death</color>.
Pale Death: Deals damage based on current HP percentage to 1 target, and inflicts <color=#FF423F>Despair</color>. Lasts for 3 turns.
5. Trumpeter cannot be targeted and will not attack. Trumpeter will use <color=#FF423F>Horn of the End</color> to instantly activate other Shadows' skills.
6. If all other Shadows are defeated, Trumpeter will become targetable and begin preparing the <color=#FF423F>Horn of Ruin</color> for 2 turns.
Horn of Ruin: Sacrifices self to resummon all defeated Shadows, greatly strengthening their abilities and dealing heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves.

title: Wraith of Envy
text:
The Wraith of Envy and its eyes share a <color=#FF423F>Soul Link</color>.
Soul Link: Distributes all damage received between all Shadows who share this condition, based on the percentage of their current HP.
Each turn, the Wraith of Envy will lock on to 1 Phantom Thief, and deal heavy damage to that Phantom Thief on the next turn.

title: Asura
text:
These Shadows have no weaknesses or resistances.
Each Shadow will activate their unique skills each turn.
1. Jikokuten has <color=#FF423F>Blade of Sanctuary</color>.
Blade of Sanctuary: Grants a shield to all Shadows. Lasts for 2 turns.
2. Zouchouten has <color=#FF423F>Growth of All Things</color>.
Growth of All Things: Permanently increases damage of all Shadows.
3. Koumokuten has <color=#FF423F>Eye of Heaven</color>.
Eye of Heaven: Selects 1 Phantom Thief. Increases their damage taken and has Shadows focus attacks on them next turn.
4. Bishamonten has <color=#FF423F>Parasol of Chaos</color>.
Parasol of Chaos: Covers the Shadow with the lowest HP, and changes all affinities to Resist. Lasts for 2 turns.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
1. Genbu alternates between using two skills: <color=#FF423F>High Tide</color> and <color=#FF423F>Ebb Tide</color>.
2. Ebb Tide: Inflict 2 <color=#FF423F>Submerged</color> stacks on all Phantom Thieves.
Purge all other Shadows and summon 2 Decarabias and 2 Yurlungurs.
3. High Tide: Deal damage to all Phantom Thieves and inflict 1 Submerged stack.
4. Submerged: At the end of turns, deal damage equal to 10% of max HP.
This effect lasts 4 turns and can stack.
5. When Decarabia is defeated, remove 1 Submerged stack.
During Ebb Tide, inflict 1 Submerged stack on all Phantom Thieves.
6. When Yurlungur is defeated, restore all Phantom Thieves' HP by 20% and grant 1 Defense debuff to all Shadows.
This effect lasts for 2 turns.
During Ebb Tide, restore all Shadows' HP by 20% for each Yurlungur present.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
1. Genbu alternates between using two skills: <color=#FF423F>High Tide</color> and <color=#FF423F>Ebb Tide</color>.
2. Ebb Tide: Inflict 2 <color=#FF423F>Submerged</color> stacks on all Phantom Thieves.
Purge all other Shadows and summon 2 Decarabias and 2 Yurlungurs.
3. High Tide: Deal damage to all Phantom Thieves and inflict 1 Submerged stack.
4. Submerged: At the end of turns, deal damage equal to 10% of max HP.
This effect lasts 4 turns and can stack.
5. When Decarabia is defeated, remove 1 Submerged stack.
During Ebb Tide, inflict 1 Submerged stack on all Phantom Thieves.
6. When Yurlungur is defeated, restore all Phantom Thieves' HP by 20% and grant 1 Defense debuff to all Shadows.
This effect lasts for 2 turns.
During Ebb Tide, restore all Shadows' HP by 20% for each Yurlungur present.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Shadows have different weaknesses and resistances than normal.
1. Genbu alternates between using two skills: <color=#FF423F>High Tide</color> and <color=#FF423F>Ebb Tide</color>.
2. Ebb Tide: Inflict 2 <color=#FF423F>Submerged</color> stacks on all Phantom Thieves.
Purge all other Shadows and summon 2 Decarabias and 2 Yurlungurs.
3. High Tide: Deal damage to all Phantom Thieves and inflict 1 Submerged stack.
4. Submerged: At the end of turns, deal damage equal to 10% of max HP.
This effect lasts 4 turns and can stack.
5. When Decarabia is defeated, remove 1 Submerged stack.
During Ebb Tide, inflict 1 Submerged stack on all Phantom Thieves.
6. When Yurlungur is defeated, restore all Phantom Thieves' HP by 20% and grant 1 Defense debuff to all Shadows.
This effect lasts for 2 turns.
During Ebb Tide, restore all Shadows' HP by 20% for each Yurlungur present.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Raja Naga alternates between <color=#FF423F>Royal Decree</color> and <color=#FF423F>Royal Punishment</color>.
1. Royal Decree: Grants 3 stacks of <color=#FF423F>Royal Shield</color> to all Shadows.
Royal Shield: Damage taken decreases by 15%. Stacks up to 5 times.
Lose 1 stack when damaged by a skill, Resonance, or Highlight.
2. Royal Punishment: Locks on to a Phantom Thief, and deals severe damage on the next turn.
If Raja Naga takes damage a total of 15 times from skills, Resonances, or Highlights, the lock on will be lost.
3. Other Nagas cannot be defeated while Raja Naga is present.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Raja Naga will use the following skills.
1. Royal Decree: Grants 3 <color=#FF423F>Royal Shield</color> stacks to all Shadows.
Royal Shield: Damage taken decreases by 15%. Stacks up to 5 times.
Lose 1 stack when damaged by a skill, Resonance, or Highlight.
1. Royal Punishment: Locks on to a Phantom Thief, and deals severe damage on the next turn.
If Raja Naga takes damage a total of 20 times from skills, Resonances, or Highlights, the lock on will be lost.
3. <color=#FF423F>Royal Blessing</color>: When any Naga has more than 25% HP remaining, its own damage is greatly increased.
Afterwards, all other Nagas heal 50% of their HP.
4. At the start of each turn, Raja Naga automatically gains 1 Royal Shield stack.
5. Other Nagas cannot be defeated while Raja Naga is present.

title: Wraith of Envy
text:
<color=#FF423F>Wraith of Envy</color>:
1. While both of the Wraith of Envy's eyes are present, all affinities will be Resist.
When both eyes have been defeated, it enters a Weakened state and will take more damage.
2. When the Wraith of Envy's eyes are defeated, they will revive after 3 turns.
3. The Wraith of Envy will gather power every other turn, and on the next turn uses <color=#FF423F>Dark Whisper</color>, dealing heavy Curse damage to all Phantom Thieves.
If both eyes are defeated while gathering power, Dark Whisper will not be activated. If one eye is defeated while gathering power, the damage of Dark Whisper will be decreased by 30%.

title: Wraith of Envy
text:
<color=#FF423F>Wraith of Envy</color>:
1. The Wraith of Envy and its eyes are in the <color=#FF423F>Soul Link</color> state.
Soul Link: Distributes all damage received between all Shadows who share this condition, based on the percentage of their current HP.
2. The Wraith of Envy is Enraged, and its damage increases every turn.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
Raja Naga will use the following skills.
1. Royal Decree: Grants 3 <color=#FF423F>Royal Shield</color> stacks to all Shadows.
Royal Shield: Damage taken decreases by 15%. Stacks up to 5 times.
Lose 2 stack when damaged by a skill, Resonance, or Highlight.
1. Royal Punishment: Locks on to a Phantom Thief, and deals severe damage on the next turn.
If Raja Naga takes damage a total of 25 times from skills, Resonances, or Highlights, the lock on will be lost.
3. <color=#FF423F>Royal Blessing</color>: When any Naga has more than 25% HP remaining, its own damage is greatly increased.
Afterwards, all other Nagas heal 50% of their HP.
4. At the start of each turn, Raja Naga automatically gains 2 Royal Shield stacks.
5. Other Nagas cannot be defeated while Raja Naga is present.

title: Asura
text:
When the number of Shadows falls below 3, they will sacrifice themselves to summon <color=#FF423F>Asura</color>.
Asura has the special skills of the sacrificed Shadow (if there are less than 2 special skills, it will gain a special skill from another Shadow at random.
Asura activates its skill every turn.

title: Trumpeter
text:
These Shadows have no weaknesses or resistances.
1. At the start of battle, Trumpeter summons 4 Shadows, and becomes invincible.
These Shadows share a <color=#FF423F>Soul Link</color>, and if all four are defeated, Trumpeter will enter a Mania state.
Soul Link: Distributes all damage received between all Shadows who share this condition, based on the percentage of their current HP.
2. Trumpeter and the Shadows will sound their horns once every 3 turns. They cannot sound their horns if they are affected by a spiritual ailment.
3. White Rider: On Trumpeter's command, it will sound the <color=#FF423F>Horn of Pestilence</color>, decreasing the max HP of 1 random Phantom Thief.
4. Red Rider: On Trumpeter's command, it will sound the <color=#FF423F>Horn of War</color>, granting itself the Horn of War status.
When this status is active, it will counterattack when attacked. Lasts for 1 turn.
5. Black Rider: On Trumpeter's command, it will sound the <color=#FF423F>Horn of Famine</color>, increasing the SP cost of skills for 1 random Phantom Thief.
6. Pale Rider: On Trumpeter's command, it will sound the <color=#FF423F>Horn of Death</color>, decreasing the healing effect of all Phantom Thieves' skills, and increasing all Shadows' damage. Lasts for 2 turns.
7. Trumpeter: Each time a Shadow sounds a horn, Trumpeter gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Power of Ruin</color> stack.
After all the Shadows have been commanded, Trumpeter will prepare for 1 turn before sounding the Horn of Ruin.
This will spend all Power of Ruin stacks to deal Almighty damage to all Phantom Thieves (deals higher damage based on the Attack of all Shadows).
Additional effects are based on the number of Power of Ruin stacks.
1 stack: Final attack power increases by 25%.
2 stacks: Damage increases by 15%.
3 stacks: All Shadows heal 10% of their HP.
4 stacks: This attack is guaranteed to be a critical hit.

title: Trumpeter
text:
8. After all Shadows have been defeated once, Trumpeter will enter a Mania state, sacrificing 50% of its own HP to revive the Shadows, and becoming invincible again.
The Shadows share a <color=#FF423F>Soul Link</color>, and once they are defeated, Trumpeter will lose its invincibility.
9. When in the Mania state, Trumpeter does not spend Power of Ruin when it sounds the Horn of Ruin, but still gains additional effects based on the number of stacks.
The number of stacks of Power of Ruin will increase the damage of all Shadows.

title: Minami Miyashita's Skills
text:
1. Minami specializes in <color=#FF423F>healing</color> allies.
By gaining <color=#FF423F>Diagnosis</color>, she can further increase her healing abilities to save her teammates from danger.
2. She can <color=#FF423F>increase max HP</color> and <color=#FF423F>remove debuffs</color>, allowing her to boost her allies' survivability. Some skills can also provide continuous healing to allies over time.
3. She can grant <color=#FF423F>increased damage</color> to Phantom Thieves healed.

title: Yusuke Kitagawa's Skills
text:
1. Yusuke specializes in <color=#FF423F>counterattacks</color> to deal heavy damage back at foes.
By enhancing his skills, Yusuke's counterattacks can trigger with every attack taken, and can target <color=#FF423F>all enemies</color>.
2. Skill damage is based on Yusuke's own <color=#FF423F>Defense</color>.
When he has a shield, his attacks gain a <color=#FF423F>pierce</color> effect, making them even stronger.
3. Yusuke's powerful <color=#FF423F>Taunt ability</color> improves his counterattacks and survivability.
He can protect allies from taking powerful enemy attacks, and then deal even greater damage with a counterattack.

title: Yaoling Li's Skills
text:
1. Yaoling specializes in <color=#FF423F>inflicting debuffs on all foes</color>.
She can <color=#FF423F>lower Defense</color> and <color=#FF423F>increase damage taken</color>, making her allies' attacks more effective.
2. During battle, Yaoling can collect <color=#FF423F>Memories</color>, allowing her to gain <color=#FF423F>Meng Po Soup</color>, increasing the effectiveness of her debuff skills.
3. When foes are inflicted with <color=#FF423F>Forget</color>, their attack skills are weakened.

title: Haruna Nishimori's Skills
text:
1. Haruna specializes in <color=#FF423F>full-party buffs</color>.
She can <color=#FF423F>increase Attack</color> and <color=#FF423F>damage</color> for all of her teammates.
2. By teaming up with allies who have different <color=#FF423F>attack types</color> or who use <color=#FF423F>multi-hit attacks</color>, the effects of her buffs on the whole party can be enhanced.

title: Makoto Nijima's Skills
text:
1. Makoto specializes in <color=#FF423F>single-target attacks</color>.
She can deal extra damage to foes with <color=#FF423F>elemental ailments</color>.
2. When certain conditions are met during battle, she can enter the <color=#FF423F>Crash Out</color> state. Her skills will be enhanced, greatly increasing her Attack and survivability.
3. She is able to <color=#FF423F>heal allies</color> while strengthening herself, allowing her to turn the tide of combat.

title: Yumi Shiina's Skills
text:
1. Yumi specializes in <color=#FF423F>providing buffs to all allies</color>.
She can increase the team's <color=#FF423F>Attack</color> and <color=#FF423F>damage of specific attributes</color>.
2. When allies deal damage, Yumi can create <color=#FF423F>Mixers</color> of the same attribute, and mix them together into a <color=#FF423F>Cocktail</color> that strengthens allies' skills.
When the team has multiple Phantom Thieves of the <color=#FF423F>same attribute</color>, the effect is stronger.

title: Ayaka Sakai's Skills
text:
1. Ayaka specializes in <color=#FF423F>single-target buffs</color>, and can grant increased Attack and damage to an ally.
2. She can directly activate an ally's <color=#FF423F>Highlight</color> and greatly increase its damage.
3. Ayaka can also replenish the <color=#FF423F>Highlight</color> gauge, allowing Highlights to be activated more frequently.

title: Ren Amamiya's Skills
text:
1. Ren specializes in <color=#FF423F>multi-target attacks</color>. He can gain <color=#FF423F>Will of Rebellion</color> with certain attack skills and increase his own Attack. He can gain more <color=#FF423F>Will of Rebellion</color> during his turn after reducing the enemy's HP a certain amount.
2. With enough <color=#FF423F>Will of Rebellion</color>, he gains an extra action and greatly increases his damage.

title: Tropical Motoha's Skills
text:
1. Tropical Motoha specializes in <color=#FF423F>multi-target attacks</color>.
When she is in the <color=#FF423F>Summer Hype</color> state, she gains <color=#FF423F>increased damage</color> and <color=#FF423F>increased critical rate</color>, making her skills more powerful.
2. After receiving <color=#FF423F>healing</color>, her skill <color=#FF423F>cooldown time</color> is reduced, and her abilities are greatly improved.
3. When her HP increases, she gains increased Attack. This allows her to improve her survivability, while also strengthening her offensive capability.

title: Seaside Tomoko's Skills
text:
1. Seaside Tomoko has excellent <color=#FF423F>healing and attack</color> capabilities.
After inflicting a certain number of <color=#FF423F>Sparks</color> on foes, she activates <color=#FF423F>Dazzling Fireworks</color>, dealing damage to enemies while also healing allies.
Team up with allies who use <color=#FF423F>multi-target</color> or <color=#FF423F>multi-hit</color> attacks to build up Sparks quickly.
2. She can increase her allies' <color=#FF423F>Attack</color> and <color=#FF423F>survivability</color>.
She can also reduce the damage dealt by enemies and increase their damage taken, giving her <color=#FF423F>excellent support capability</color>.

title: Yui's Skills
text:
1. Yui specializes in <color=#FF423F>single-target attacks</color>.
After an ally uses an attack skill, she has a chance to activate a <color=#FF423F>follow-up attack skill</color>.
2. Yui can select one ally to be <color=#FF423F>Player 2</color>.
When she uses a Highlight or selects a Player 2, her follow-up attacks get even stronger.
3. She can also deal more damage to <color=#FF423F>Shocked</color> enemies.

title: Kira Kitazato's Skills
text: 1. Kira specializes in <color=#FF423F>single-target Physical attacks</color>. During battle, he can switch between 2 different attack modes by using <color=#FF423F>Nightfall</color> to use different skills.

title: Kira Kitazato's Skills
text:
2. In <color=#FF423F>Doctor</color> mode, Kira's skills will inflict <color=#FF423F>Bleed</color> on targets, causing a fixed amount of damage over time. It's especially effective against enemies with high HP.
3. In <color=#FF423F>Ripper</color> mode, Kira deals bonus Physical damage based on the number of <color=#FF423F>Bleed</color> stacks the enemy has.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Every turn, Kumbhanda will attack Phantom Thieves who have a <color=#FF423F>Grudge</color> stack.
If no Phantom Thieves have a Grudge, it will attack all Phantom Thieves.
2. Whenever Kumbhanda attacks, it decreases the target's max HP by 20%, and increases the max HP of the Agathion with the lowest HP by 20%.
3. When Agathion is hit by an attack, the attacker is inflicted with 1 Grudge stack for 1 turn.
4. If an Agathion's HP is less than 40% at the start of its turn, it transforms into Kumbhanda.
If it is defeated, it restores the HP of all Shadows by 40%.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Every turn, Kumbhanda will attack Phantom Thieves who have a <color=#FF423F>Grudge</color> stack.
If no Phantom Thieves have a Grudge, it will attack all Phantom Thieves.
2. Whenever Kumbhanda attacks, it reduces the target's SP by 20%, and restores 10 SP to 1 random Agathion.
3. When Agathion is hit by an attack, the attacker is inflicted with 1 Grudge stack for 1 turn.
4. If an Agathion's SP is less than 40% at the start of its turn, it transforms into Kumbhanda.
If it is defeated, it restores the SP of all Shadows by 40%.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Each turn, Girimehkala inflicts a <color=#FF423F>Mark of Calamity</color> on 2 Phantom Thieves. Lasts for 2 turns.
2. When a Phantom Thief with a Mark of Calamity deals damage with a skill, <color=#FF423F>Calamity's Descent</color> is activated on that Phantom Thief: Deals multi-target damage based on the user's Attack, and inflicts a Mark of Calamity on the main target of the skill.
3. All Shadows take 60% decreased final damage from all attacks other than Calamity's Descent.
4. After taking damage from Calamity's Descent, damage taken is greatly increased.
Lasts for 1 turn.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Each turn, Girimehkala inflicts a <color=#FF423F>Mark of Calamity</color> on 2 Phantom Thieves. Lasts for 2 turns.
2. When a Phantom Thief with a Mark of Calamity deals damage with a skill, <color=#FF423F>Calamity's Descent</color> is activated on that Phantom Thief.
Calamity's Descent: Deals multi-target damage based on the user's Attack, and inflicts a Mark of Calamity on the main target of the skill.
3. All Shadows take 60% decreased final damage from all attacks other than Calamity's Descent.
4. Up to 2 Marks of Calamity can be held.
When Mark of Calamity reaches 2 stacks, using a skill will activate Ruinous Calamity once, dealing severe damage.
This effect does not inflict a Mark of Calamity on the target.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Each turn, Girimehkala inflicts a <color=#FF423F>Mark of Calamity</color> on 2 Phantom Thieves and 1 Shadow.
Lasts for 2 turns.
2. When a Phantom Thief with a Mark of Calamity deals damage with a skill, <color=#FF423F>Calamity's Descent</color> is activated on that Phantom Thief.
Calamity's Descent: Deals multi-target damage based on the user's Attack, and inflicts a Mark of Calamity on the main target of the skill.
3. All Shadows take 60% decreased final damage from all attacks other than Calamity's Descent.
4. When Girimehkala has a Mark of Calamity, its damage is permanently increased by 50% after attacking.
5. When Incubus has a Mark of Calamity, it heals all Shadows after attacking.
6. If Succubus has a Mark of Calamity, it will inflict <color=#FF423F>Dizzy</color> on 1 Phantom Thief after attacking.
7. If Oni has a Mark of Calamity, it greatly increases the damage of another Shadow after attacking.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Belphegor is always <color=#FF423F>Asleep</color>.
After being attacked, he will wake up, and can take 1 action before going back to sleep.
2. Each time Belphegor acts, it gains 1 stack of <color=#FF423F>Irate</color>, and its damage increases.
3. When Sandman is defeated, Belphegor will fall asleep.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Belphegor is always <color=#FF423F>Asleep</color>.
After being attacked, he will wake up, and can take 1 action before going back to sleep.
2. Belphegor takes increased damage while Asleep.
Every 2 turns, it summons 1 Sandman.
3. When Sandman is defeated, Belphegor will fall asleep.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Belphegor is always <color=#FF423F>Asleep</color>.
After being attacked, he will wake up, and can take 1 action before going back to sleep.
2. Belphegor deals increased damage to Sleeping targets.
3. Every turn, Sandman will choose 1 random target and put them to Sleep. Lasts for 2 turns.
4. The first time Decarabia takes damage each turn, it will counterattack all targets 1 time.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. At the start of battle, 3 Warriors will appear.
When the Warriors are defeated, Valkyrie will receive a buff, and 1 more of the same Warrior will reappear.
2. When 3 Warriors have been defeated, the Warriors will leave and Valkyrie will appear.
3. When Setanta is defeated, Valkyrie receives the following effect: At the end of the turn, restores 20% of HP. Stacks up to 3 times.
4. When Cu Chulainn is defeated, Valkyrie receives the following effect: When using a skill, all Phantom Thieves are inflicted with <color=#FF423F>Army of Ruin</color>.
Army of Ruin: After acting, take damage equal to 30% of HP.
Stacks up to 3 times.
5. When Narcissus is defeated, Valkyrie receives the following effect: After using a skill, makes 1 additional follow-up attack on the Phantom Thief with the lowest HP.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. At the start of battle, 3 Warriors will appear.
When the Warriors are defeated, Valkyrie will receive a buff, and 1 more of the same Warrior will reappear.
2. When 3 Warriors have been defeated, the Warriors will leave and Valkyrie will appear.
3. When Setanta is defeated, Valkyrie receives the following effect: When using a skill, Attack is greatly increased.
Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 3 times.
4. When Cu Chulainn is defeated, Valkyrie receives the following effect: After attacking, all Phantom Thieves' damage taken is increased.
Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 3 times.
5. When Narcissus is defeated, Valkyrie receives the following effect: After using a skill, makes an additional multi-target follow-up attack.
Stacks up to 3 times.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Pazuzu's skills can inflict <color=#FF423F>Plague Curse</color>.
Plague Curse: Deals damage equal to 5% of HP at the end of the turn.
2. Pazuzu uses <color=#FF423F>Spreading Sickness</color> every other turn.
Spreading Sickness: Inflicts 2 Plague Curse stacks on all Phantom Thieves, with a high chance of inflicting spiritual ailments.
3. Pazuzu uses <color=#FF423F>Eternal Binding</color> every other turn.
Eternal Binding: Inflicts 2 Plague Curse stacks on all Phantom Thieves, and removes 1 Plague Curse stack from the target.
4. When Pale Rider attacks, it inflicts 1 Plague Curse stack on Shadows.
While Pale Rider is present, Pazuzu's final damage taken is reduced by 30%.
5. When Sudama is defeated, all Phantom Thieves' ailment resistance is increased by 100%.
Lasts for 2 turns.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Pazuzu's skills can inflict <color=#FF423F>Plague Curse</color>.
Plague Curse: Deals damage equal to 5% of HP at the end of the turn.
2. Pazuzu uses <color=#FF423F>Spreading Sickness</color> every other turn.
Spreading Sickness: Inflicts 2 Plague Curse stacks on all Phantom Thieves, and inflicts 2 Plague Curse stacks on Pixie.
3. Pazuzu uses <color=#FF423F>Eternal Binding</color> every other turn.
Eternal Binding: Inflicts 2 Plague Curse stacks on all Phantom Thieves, and removes 1 Plague Curse stack from the target.
4. When Pale Rider attacks, it inflicts 1 Plague Curse stack on Shadows.
While Pale Rider is present, Pazuzu's final damage taken is reduced by 30%.
5. When Pixie uses a skill, all Phantom Thieves have 1 Plague Curse stack removed.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Pazuzu's skills can inflict <color=#FF423F>Plague Curse</color>.
Plague Curse: Deals damage equal to 5% of HP at the end of the turn.
2. Pazuzu uses <color=#FF423F>Spreading Sickness</color> every other turn.
Spreading Sickness: Inflicts Plague Origin on 1 Black Ooze. Lasts for 2 turns.
3. After a Shadow with <color=#FF423F>Plague Origin</color> attacks, all Phantom Thieves are inflicted with 2 Plague Curse stacks.
After being defeated, Pazuzu is inflicted with 2 Plague Curse stacks.
4. Pazuzu uses <color=#FF423F>Eternal Binding</color> every other turn.
Eternal Binding: Inflicts 2 Plague Curse stacks on all Phantom Thieves, and removes 1 Plague Curse stack from the target.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Horus is blessed by the Sun God, and at the end of each turn it gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Power of the Sun</color> stack.
Power of the Sun: Damage taken decreased by 20%.
2. If Horus has Power of the Sun at the beginning of its turn, it deals heavy Almighty damage to all Phantom Thieves.
Damage increases based on the number of stacks of Power of the Sun.
3. Kushi Mitama has the power of the Moon God, and removes 1 Power of the Sun stack from Horus every turn. In exchange, it loses 34% of its max HP.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Horus is blessed by the Sun God, and at the end of each turn it gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Power of the Sun</color> stack.
Power of the Sun: Damage taken decreased by 20%.
2. If Horus has Power of the Sun at the beginning of its turn, it deals heavy Almighty damage to all Phantom Thieves.
Damage increases based on the number of Power of the Sun stacks.
3. The Left Eye of Horus removes 1 Power of the Sun stack from Horus each turn. In exchange, it loses 34% of its max HP.
4. The Right Eye of Horus grants 3 Power of the Sun stacks to Horus when it is defeated.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Horus is blessed by the Sun God, and at the end of each turn it gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Power of the Sun</color> stack.
Power of the Sun: Final damage taken decreased by 20%.
2. If Horus has Power of the Sun at the beginning of its turn, it deals heavy Almighty damage to all Phantom Thieves.
Damage increases based on the number of Power of the Sun stacks.
3. The Left Eye of Horus removes 1 Power of the Sun stack from Horus each turn.
In exchange, it loses 34% of its max HP.
4. The Right Eye of Horus grants 1 Power of the Sun stack to Horus each turn.
If it is defeated, Horus loses all Power of the Sun stacks.
5. The Right Eye of Horus removes all continuous damage effects on Horus at the start of its turn.
For each effect removed, Horus takes 3% of its max HP as damage (this is affected by Horus' final damage reduction).
6. The Right Eye of Horus has <color=#FF423F>Protection of Horus</color>, which decreases damage taken outside of its own turn by 60%, but increases damage taken during its own turn by 300%.
7. If only the Left Eye of Horus remains on the field, it transforms into Seth and takes control of the field.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Unicorn will activate <color=#FF423F>Sacred Blessing</color>.
Sacred Blessing: Deals Bless damage to all Phantom Thieves, gains 10 stacks of <color=#FF423F>Purity</color>, and summons 1 Emperor's Amulet.
2. Unicorn will activate <color=#FF423F>Sacred Radiance</color> 2 turns after activating Sacred Blessing.
Sacred Radiance: Deals heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves based on the number of Purity stacks.
If there are 5 stacks of Purity or more, Phantom Thieves will also be inflicted with <color=#FF423F>Rebuke</color>.
Rebuke: Permanently increases damage taken by 50%.
3. Each stack of Purity decreases Unicorn's damage taken by 5% for each stack. Lose 1 stack for each status ailment inflicted.
4. When Emperor's Amulet is inflicted with a status ailment, the same ailment is inflicted on Unicorn, and 1 stack of Purity is removed.
5. Emperor's Talisman will die after 1 action, and Unicorn will take damage equal to the HP lost by Emperor's Talisman.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Unicorn will activate <color=#FF423F>Sacred Blessing</color>.
Sacred Blessing: Deals Bless damage to all Phantom Thieves, gains 15 stacks of <color=#FF423F>Purity</color>, and summons 1 Emperor's Amulet.
2. Unicorn will activate <color=#FF423F>Sacred Radiance</color> 2 turns after activating Sacred Blessing.
Sacred Radiance: Deals heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves based on the number of Purity stacks.
If there are 5 stacks of Purity or more, Phantom Thieves will also be inflicted with <color=#FF423F>Rebuke</color>.
Rebuke: Permanently increases damage taken by 50%.
3. Each stack of Purity decreases Unicorn's damage taken by 5% for each stack. Lose 1 stack for each status ailment inflicted.

5. Emperor's Talisman will die after 1 action, and Unicorn will take damage equal to the HP lost by Emperor's Talisman.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Unicorn will activate <color=#FF423F>Sacred Blessing</color>.
Sacred Blessing: Deals Bless damage to all Phantom Thieves, gains 25 stacks of <color=#FF423F>Purity</color>, and summons 1 Emperor's Amulet.
2. Unicorn will activate <color=#FF423F>Sacred Radiance</color> 2 turns after activating Sacred Blessing.
Sacred Radiance: Deals heavy damage to all Phantom Thieves based on the number of Purity stacks.
If there are 5 stacks of Purity or more, Phantom Thieves will also be inflicted with <color=#FF423F>Rebuke</color>.
Rebuke: Permanently increases damage taken by 50%.
3. Each stack of Purity decreases Unicorn's damage taken by 5% for each stack. Lose 1 stack for each status ailment inflicted.
4. When Emperor's Amulet is inflicted with a status ailment, the same ailment is inflicted on Unicorn, and 1 stack of Purity is removed.
5. Emperor's Talisman will die after 1 action, and Unicorn will take damage equal to the HP lost by Emperor's Talisman.

title: Moha
text:
1. After acting each turn, if Moha has taken damage during that turn, its <color=#FF423F>Wrath</color> increases by 4.
If it has not taken damage during the turn, its Wrath decreases by 1.
2. If Moha's Wrath reaches 12 by the end of the turn, it will spend all Wrath to use <color=#FF423F>Rapid Ascent</color>, and on the next turn, uses <color=#FF423F>Sphinx Dive</color> to deal heavy Physical damage to all Phantom Thieves.
3. When Moha is on the field, the Phantom Thieves gain a small amount of Ballista Energy at the end of each turn.
4. When the Phantom Thieves deal weakness damage to Moha, they gain a large amount of <color=#FF423F>Ballista Energy</color>. This can be done only once per turn.
5. When the Phantom Thieves have 100 Ballista Energy at the start of the turn, they will spend 100 Ballista Energy to attack Moha with a <color=#FF423F>Ballista Shot</color>, putting it in a Weakened state and causing it to lose all Wrath.

title: Futaba's Skills
text:
1. Oracle specializes in <color=#FF423F>multi-target debuff skills</color>. She can inflict <color=#FF423F>Disrupting Virus</color> on all foes to manipulate their affinities.
2. She can decrease Defense and increase damage taken by foes, and can use an additional debuff to increase the damage taken from their weaknesses.
3. During battle, she can collect <color=#FF423F>Clues</color> to activate <color=#FF423F>Analysis Complete</color>, increasing damage for all her allies and granting them a <color=#FF423F>shield</color>.

title: Ashiya's Skills
text:
1. Cherish specializes in <color=#FF423F>boosting the Defense of allies</color>.
He can grant his allies a <color=#FF423F>shield</color> or increase their Defense to improve their survivability.
2. During battle, he can use <color=#FF423F>Emblem of Honesty</color> to protect allies from damage and gain <color=#FF423F>Heroism</color> to activate <color=#FF423F>Declaration of Justice</color>.
3. Declaration of Justice strengthens skills, and further increases the Attack and survivability of allies.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Hell Biker alternates between <color=#FF423F>Hellfire</color> and <color=#FF423F>Cleansing Flame</color>.
2. Hellfire: Deals heavy Fire damage to all Phantom Thieves, and inflicts <color=#FF423F>Hellscorched</color> if the target's HP is low.
Hellscorched: Take damage equal to 35% of max HP each turn.
3. Cleansing Flame: Deals heavy Fire damage to the Phantom Thief with the highest Attack, permanently decreases Attack by 50%, and increases Hell Biker's Attack by 30%.
4. Oni and Hell Biker have the <color=#FF423F>Soul Link</color> condition.
5. Oni will prioritize attacking the Phantom Thief with the lowest HP.

title: Haru's Skills
text:
1. Noir specializes in <color=#FF423F>multi-target attacks</color>.
By using certain skills, she gains <color=#FF423F>Reform</color>, allowing her to deal powerful Psychokinesis damage with long-range attacks.
2. Each skill Noir activates will give different types of Reform.
Each one will <color=#FF423F>enhance her long-range attacks</color> in various ways.
3. By increasing Noir's ailment accuracy, she can not only gain increased Attack and critical damage, she can also improve the accuracy of her <color=#FF423F>Marked</color> effect.

title: Avidya's Skills
text:
1. Avidya cannot be targeted in the first phase of battle, and will continuously summon Corporobos to fight the Phantom Thieves.
After a certain number of Corporobos have been defeated, Avidya will move to the second phase.
2. Avidya cannot be targeted in the second phase of battle, and will summon a team of powerful Corporobos to fight.
When all of the Corporobos have been defeated, Avidya will move to the third phase, where he can be targeted and will not use any skills.
3. During the battle, Avidya will use <color=#FF423F>Selfless Devotion</color> on randomly selected Corporobos, who will self-destruct after 2 turns, dealing heavy damage to the Phantom Thieves.
4. Corporobo MDL-CH will use Overtime Order on the Shadow with the highest Attack, granting it an extra turn.
5. Corporobo MDL-DM will use <color=#FF423F>Performance Evaluation</color> on the Shadow with the lowest Attack, increasing its Attack, and promoting it to a Corporobo MDL-AM after 2 turns.
6. Corporobo MDL-GM uses skills to buff and heal Shadows.
7. Corporobo MDL-ED will use <color=#FF423F>Team-Building Exercise</color> to drain all other Shadows' HP to strengthen itself.

title: Slow Dance Kotone's Skills
text:
1. Mont specializes in <color=#FF423F>single-target attacks</color>. During battle, she can switch between <color=#FF423F>Wind Form</color> and <color=#FF423F>Ice Form</color>, allowing her to use different skills.
2. During battle, she can create a barrier to collect Ice Crystals, and then spend Ice Crystals to shatter the barrier and unleash a powerful Resonance on enemies.
3. When a Phantom Thief with the same Attribute uses skills, more Ice Crystals can be collected, and Mont will deal more damage.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Shiki-Ouji changes forms every turn.
2. In Defense Form, Shiki-Ouji permanently gains 5 <color=#FF423F>Defensive Stance</color> stacks.
Defensive Stance: Damage taken is decreased by 10%. Lose 1 stack when taking weakness damage.
3. In Attack Form, Shiki-Ouji will act twice, and each stack of Defensive Stance increases its damage by 25%.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Seiryu alternates between inflicting weaknesses to Psychokinesis and Nuclear. These effects last for 2 turns.
2. When a Shadow is defeated, Seiryu gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Azure Storm</color> stack.
Azure Storm: Damage increases by 30%.
When Azure Storm reaches 6 stacks, Seiryu deals heavy damage.
3. Every 2 turns, Seiryu summons 1 Phoenix and 1 Leanan Sidhe.
Phoenix uses Nuclear skills, and Leanan Sidhe uses Psychokinesis skills.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Seiryu alternates between inflicting weaknesses to Wind and Ice. These effects last for 2 turns.
2. When a Shadow is defeated, Seiryu gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Azure Storm</color> stack.
Azure Storm: Damage increases by 30%.
When Azure Storm reaches 6 stacks, Seiryu deals heavy damage.
3. At the start of the turn, if there are no Sudama or Kodama on the field, 1 Sudama or Kodama will be summoned.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Each turn, Seiryu will record the attributes of damage it takes, and on the next turn inflicts a weakness to those attributes to a Shadow.
2. When a Shadow is defeated, Seiryu gains 1 <color=#FF423F>Azure Storm</color> stack.
Azure Storm: Damage increases by 30%.
When Azure Storm reaches 6 stacks, Seiryu deals heavy damage.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Raja Naga alternates between <color=#FF423F>Royal Blessing</color> and <color=#FF423F>Royal Punishment</color>.
2. Royal Blessing: Greatly strengthens 1 Shadow, and when that Shadow attacks, it can inflict <color=#FF423F>Brainwash</color> on 1 Phantom Thief.
3. Royal Punishment: Locks on to a Phantom Thief, and deals heavy damage on the next turn.
If Shadows take damage from 4 different attribute types, the lock on will be lost.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Raja Naga alternates between <color=#FF423F>Royal Blessing</color> and <color=#FF423F>Royal Punishment</color>.
2. Royal Blessing: Greatly strengthens 1 Shadow, and when that Shadow attacks, all Shadows' ailment resistance is increased.
3. Royal Punishment: Locks on to the Phantom Thief with the highest Attack, and deals heavy damage on the next turn.
If Shadows are inflicted with a total of 15 debuffs, the lock on will be lost.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Byakko alternates between <color=#FF423F>Byakko's Claw</color> and <color=#FF423F>Byakko's Fang</color>.
2. Byakko's Claw: Deals damage to 1 target and inflicts <color=#FF423F>Deep Wounds</color>.
This effect deals damage over time, and can be removed by receiving healing 3 times.
3. Byakko's Fang: Deals damage to all targets and inflicts <color=#FF423F>Bite Marks</color>.
This effect increases damage taken, and can be removed by dealing damage 3 times.
4. At the start of each turn, if both Deep Wounds and Bite Marks have been inflicted, Byakko will activate <color=#FF423F>Prey</color>, dealing heavy damage and inflicting <color=#FF423F>Despair</color> on the target.
5. Every 2 turns, 1 Leanan Sidhe will be summoned.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Byakko alternates between <color=#FF423F>Byakko's Claw</color> and <color=#FF423F>Byakko's Fang</color>.
2. Byakko's Claw: Deals damage to 1 target and inflicts <color=#FF423F>Deep Wounds</color>.
This effect deals damage over time.
3. Byakko's Fang: Deals damage to all targets and inflicts <color=#FF423F>Bite Marks</color>.
This effect increases damage taken.
4. At the start of each turn, if both Deep Wounds and Bite Marks have been inflicted, Byakko will activate <color=#FF423F>Prey</color>, dealing heavy damage and inflicting <color=#FF423F>Despair</color> on the target.
5. Every 2 turns, Byakko selects 1 Sudama as Bait, and on the next turn, eats the Sudama, fully restoring its HP and granting itself a buff.

title: Unique Shadow Abilities
text:
1. Byakko alternates between <color=#FF423F>Byakko's Claw</color> and <color=#FF423F>Byakko's Fang</color>.
2. Byakko's Claw: Deals damage to 1 target and inflicts <color=#FF423F>Deep Wounds</color>.
This effect deals damage over time, and can be removed by inflicting an elemental or spiritual ailment.
3. Byakko's Fang: Deals damage to all targets and inflicts <color=#FF423F>Bite Marks</color>.
This effect increases damage taken and can be removed by activating a Highlight or Resonance.
4. At the start of each turn, if both Deep Wounds and Bite Marks have been inflicted, Byakko will activate <color=#FF423F>Prey</color>, dealing heavy damage and inflicting Despair</color> on the target.
5. Every 2 turns, Byakko summons 1 Byakko's Afterimage.
Byakko's Afterimage has the same skills, but very low HP and ailment resistance.
